Our inflatables are made with a Presta Valve which can be used with a simple bicycle pump or an air compressor for bigger items. Please do not over inflate.

A catsuit with an integrated harness and shirt style collar. The Challenger Harness Catsuit includes simple bicep harness and shaped panels at the back. Only available with front zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker harness. Seen here in Metallic Red (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Black (second colour).
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A catsuit with an integrated harness and shirt style collar.

descriptions.full: The McQueen Harness Catsuit features a nifty shoulder harness with buckles. The catsuit also includes looser style shirt sleeves with cuffs and a smart shirt collar. Only available with front zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour). Comes without the thigh bag, but this is available for an extra 99.95 from the Optional extras menu.
descriptions.short: The McQueen Harness Catsuit features a nifty shoulder harness with buckles.

descriptions.full:
A round collar catsuit with a three point integrated harness. The Trinity Harness Catsuit has the harness on the front with just a simple finish on the back. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker harness. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour)..
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A round collar catsuit with a three point integrated harness.

descriptions.full: The Typhoon Harness Catsuit features a fixed trimmed chest harness. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour) and White (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Typhoon Harness Catsuit features a fixed trimmed chest harness

descriptions.full:
A buckled chest harness fixed onto the Tornado Harness Catsuit. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Red (main colour) with Black (trim). Also in Black (main colour) with Yellow (trim). Also available with a trim option.
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A buckled chest harness fixed onto the Tornado Harness Catsuit.

descriptions.full: The Twin Rein Harness Catsuit features an asymmetric chest harness on top. The harness includes two thick straps with metallic silver buckles and is a permanent feature connected to the catsuit. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Green (main colour) with Black (trim). Also in Metallic Fuchsia (main colour) with Metallic Pewter (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Twin Rein Harness Catsuit features an asymmetric chest harness on top.

descriptions.full:
The decadent Tuxedo Catsuit is the perfect fantasy butler boy outfit! Decorated with vertical striped panels on the chest, wrists and calfs, with a little peaked collar and decorative press studs. Only available without feet and back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour). Also in Metallic Purple (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour).
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The decadent Tuxedo Catsuit is the perfect fantasy butler boy outfit!

descriptions.full: The Aero Catsuit features a double coloured latex trim around the style lines of the catsuit. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (trim 1) and Red (trim 2). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Royal Blue (Trim 1) and Light Blue (trim 2). Only in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Aero Catsuit features a double coloured latex trim around the style lines of the catsuit

descriptions.full:
The Rider Catsuit has contrasting shoulder, crotch and bum panels as standard to highlight your good points. Shown here with front zip but all zip and other options are available. Also available as a Surfsuit- short sleeved and a Surfsuit- long sleeved. Shown here in black with red trim.
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves they come in Small 7, Medium 8 and Large 9, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural. 
If choosing attached hoods, please be aware the catsuit will be made with a Back through crotch zip. Please give us the size and colour details of the hoods and the gloves in the space for the Notes.
descriptions.short: The Rider Catsuit has contrasting shoulder, crotch and bum panels as standard to highlight your good points.

descriptions.full:
The Ribbon Catsuit features unique panels dancing around the catsuit like a ribbon! This catsuit comes with a crotch pouch. Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Orange (second colour).
For extras- please write in the notes section of the order what sizes you would like.
descriptions.short: The Ribbon Catsuit features unique panels dancing around the catsuit like a ribbon!

descriptions.full: This catsuit features contrasting leg panels shaped around the thigh and cut across the back waist. Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Olive Green (main colour) with Chocolate (second colour).
descriptions.short: This catsuit features contrasting leg panels shaped around the thigh and cut across the back waist.

descriptions.full: An interstellar style catsuit. The Battlestar Catsuit features robotic style panels across the whole catsuit. Only available with back zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) second colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Battlestar Catsuit features robotic style panels across the whole catsuit.

descriptions.full:
Available with a range of optional extras.
Seen here in Black (main colour) with Turquoise (second colour). Also in Translucent Natural (main colour) with Baby Pink (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Bioprene Catsuit features wide contrasting panels down the side of the body and arms.

descriptions.full:
The Magnus Catsuit has a unique contrasting design on the front and back. The tight fitting catsuit comes with a front or back zip. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Blue (main colour) and Black (second colour). 
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi trans Natural.
descriptions.short: The Magnus Catsuit has a unique contrasting design on the front and back.

descriptions.full:
The Speedy Catsuit has a sleek and energetic look with the dual stripes available in any colour. Shown here with a front through crotch zip but back zip and all other options are also available. Pictured here without feet. When made with feet, stripes finish in the same position. You can also chose to have the stripes on the arms only. If you would prefer this option then please state when ordering. 
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves they come in Small 7, Medium 8 and Large 9, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural. 
If choosing attached hood, please be aware the catsuit will be made with a Back through crotch zip. Please give us the size and colour details of the hood and the gloves in the space for the Notes.
descriptions.short: The Speedy Catsuit has a sleek and energetic look with the dual stripes available in any colour.

descriptions.full:
This Catsuit has a tough, smart, macho look and is sure to give you an army of followers. It features a stand up collar, belt and utility pouch (for small items like money, cigarettes and credit cards) working breast pockets with flap (mainly decorative, but perfect for carrying credit cards, tickets, etc whilst out!), epaulettes and detachable insignia armbands. The insignia armbands are attached by the epaulettes and an adjustable band around the arms and have authentic cotton insignia attached to them which may vary according to availability. Although included with outfit, armbands and belt with pouch are available separately.Shown here in olive green with red trim.
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural. Please write in the space for the Notes the size and colour you want.
descriptions.short: This Catsuit has a tough, smart, macho look and is sure to give you an army of followers.

descriptions.full:
This multi panelled catsuit gives off a futuristic vibe. The shaped collar makes a comfortable neckline, with matching coloured shoulder and wrist panels. Only available with front zip options. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour), Metallic red (second colour) with Metallic Honey (trim colour). Also in Light Blue (main colour), Royal blue (second colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (trim colour).
Only available in regular length
descriptions.short: This multi panelled catsuit gives off a futuristic vibe

descriptions.full: This racer boy style catsuit features contrasting panels across the body. The Aston Catsuit includes two loose style pockets on the thighs and buttoned collar and waistband. The zip guard is a stylish feature to hide the zip. Only available with front zip options. Front zip is through crotch with 3 sliders so you can access both the crotch and the rear, the Half Front zip has no crotch access. Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour). Also in Red (main colour) with Yellow (second colour).
descriptions.short: This racer boy style catsuit features contrasting panels across the body.

descriptions.full: The Flasher Catsuit features a unique box zip nipple opening. Unzip both the vertical and horizontal lines to open and reveal the whole pec. The handy press stud in the corner keeps the excess latex up. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note silver zips only come with black zip tape. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black. Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
descriptions.short: The Flasher Catsuit features a unique box zip nipple opening.

descriptions.full:
A Neo based catsuit made without the collar. Enjoy the feel of a completely smooth zip free catsuit.This Pull On Catsuit also has the option to add a crotch zip for essential play, as seen in the photos. Challenge yourself to squeeze into the neckhole of this catsuit, it's a little harder than it looks.
Please note the zips match (or close match) the main colour. 
Seen here in Black, also in Metallic Blue and in Translucent Olive. Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. 
The catsuit comes completely zipless as standard. If you want to add a crotch zip, please select from the OPTIONAL EXTRAS.
descriptions.short: A Neo based catsuit made without the collar.

descriptions.full: A elaborate frilly catsuit with a stunning chest piece. The Alejandro Catsuit features 3 layers of frill in contrasting colours. Please note the zip will match (or close match) the second colour if available, or main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Orange (second colour). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Black (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A elaborate frilly catsuit with a stunning chest piece.

descriptions.full: The Buckle Catsuit features an asymmetric strap design on the right thigh. The straps can be made in a contrasting colour to stand out even more. The catsuit also features buckled wrist straps and is finished off with a metal zip.  available with a variety of zip options, please note the tape of the zip only comes in black. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Black (Second colour). Also in Metallic Pewter (main colour) with Red (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Buckle Catsuit features an asymmetric strap design on the right thigh.

descriptions.full:
A catsuit fit for wonderland. This crazy Cheshire Catsuit features a stripy chest panel in two colour. The side of the catsuit also includes a contrasting colour for a fabulous silhouette. Only available with back zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Choose up to 4 colours. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Grey (second colour) and Electric Rose (trim 1) and Plum (trim 2). Also in Black (main colour) with Metallic Petrol Blue (second colour) with White (trim 1) and Pearlsheen Silver (trim 2). And in Red (main colour) with Red (second colour) with Translucent Pink (trim 1) and Black (trim 2).
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A Mod style Catsuit with a classic bulls-eye logo incorporated into the design

descriptions.full: The Commander Catsuit is the perfect uniform style catsuit to add to your collection. The faux double neckline cleverly looks as though you are wearing a shirt underneath! The lapels are finished off with laser cut stars. The waistband features an integrated belt for added detail. Only available with front zip option, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Royal Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver(second colour). Also in Metallic Green (main colour) with Metallic Pewter (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Commander Catsuit is the perfect uniform style catsuit to add to your collection.

descriptions.full: Wear your heart on your chest! The Cupid Catsuit features a distinct stripey love heart on the front. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Red (main colour) with White (second colour). Also in Metallic Petrol Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: Wear your heart on your chest! The Cupid Catsuit features a distinct stripey love heart on the front.

descriptions.full: Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: This geometric style Delorean Catsuit features a combination of sharp angles and delicate curves in the contrasting panels.

descriptions.full: A smart and simple tuxedo style catsuit. The contrasting front panel of the Dickie Catsuit is decorated with vertical stripes for a dressed up appearance. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour).
descriptions.short: A smart and simple tuxedo style catsuit.

descriptions.full:
The Donnington Catsuit has a very retro vibe that can be exaggerated by the colours you choose! The design is mirrored on the back. Can come with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Blue (main colour) with White (second colour) and Pearlsheen Silver (third colour). Also in Olive Green (main colour) with Sand (second colour) with Chocolate Brown (third colour).
Only available in Regular length.
descriptions.short: The Donnington Catsuit has a very retro vibe that can be exaggerated by the colours you choose!

descriptions.full: The Dumont Catsuit features double trimmed style lines running from the shoulder down to the end of the arms and around the legs for a streamline look. Available with a variety of zips, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Orange (second colour). Also in Turquoise (main colour) with Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Dumont Catsuit features double trimmed style lines running from the shoulder down to the end of the arms and around the legs for a streamline look

descriptions.full:
The Echo Catsuit features curved trims emitting from the crotch area! The waves bounce around the sleeves also. The crotch is shaped like our classic pouch fit so is unavailable with cock sheaths and holes. Available with a variety of zips. Seen here in Nightshade Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (trim).
Only available in regular length.
Please note, if vibrant translucent colours are chosen for trim, these will be backed onto white to make them opaque.
descriptions.short: The Echo Catsuit features curved trims emitting from the crotch area!

descriptions.full:
A unique multi panelled catsuit in two contrasting colours. The Everest Catsuit features peaks and slopes across the front and back and continues into the arms and legs. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Green (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Bubblegum Pink (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Please note the zip will match (or close match) the second colour if available, or main colour.
Only available in Regular Length.
descriptions.short: The Everest Catsuit features peaks and slopes across the front and back

descriptions.full: The Falkor Catsuit features contrasting panels down the sides of the catsuit. Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Light Blue (second colour). Also in Metallic Honey (main colour) with Metallic Green (second colour). Only available in Regular.
descriptions.short: The Falkor Catsuit features contrasting panels down the sides of the catsuit.

descriptions.full: The Fernando Frill Catsuit is the perfect outfit for a rubber ball! The catsuit features double frills along the neckline and down the front. It also features a smart shirt collar to complete the look. Available with front zip only, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in White (main colour) with Black (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Fernando Frill Catsuit is the perfect outfit for a rubber ball!

descriptions.full: A nod to the Tron Legacy, the Flynn Catsuit traces the contours of this panelled catsuit. We think its looks perfect in a bright contrasting colour. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Vibrant Bright Pink (second colour). Only in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Flynn Catsuit traces the contours of this panelled catsuit.

descriptions.full: The Frazer Catsuit features slivers of contrasting colours to make your catsuit really pop in a subtle way Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) and Yellow (trim). Also in Red (main colour) with Black (second colour) and Orange (trim).
descriptions.short: The Frazer Catsuit features slivers of contrasting colours.

descriptions.full: The Galactica Catsuit is a space inspired catsuit with panels of contrasting colour and a coloured chest piece. Only available with back zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Petrol Blue (second colour) and Pearlsheen Silver (trim). Also in Black (main colour) with White (second colour) and Yellow (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Galactica Catsuit is a space inspired catsuit with panels of contrasting colour and a coloured chest piece.

descriptions.full: The Glider catsuit features a unique trim across the chest and simply continues down the arms. Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Royal Blue (second colour). Also in Red (main colour) with White (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Glider catsuit features a unique trim across the chest and simply continues down the arms.

descriptions.full: The dandiest catsuit around! this retro inspired catsuit looks fabulous in a variety of colours. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Royal Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) and Light Blue (third colour). Also in Red (main colour) with White (second colour) and Black (third colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The dandiest catsuit around! this retro inspired catsuit looks fabulous in a variety of colours.

descriptions.full: This catsuit has a slight biker or racer boy feel. The Grinder Catsuit includes contrasting crotch and shoulder panels which is trimmed in a third colour. Only available with front zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour) and Plum (third colour). Also in Metallic Platinum (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour) and White (third colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Grinder Catsuit includes contrasting crotch and shoulder panels which is trimmed in a third colour.

descriptions.full:
The Hanky Code Catsuit is based on our most popular Neo Catsuit. With a double band of colour on the bicep. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Mid Blue (second colour). Also in Plum (main colour) with Yellow (second colour).
Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
Please note,translucent vibrant colours are backed onto white to make them opaque, as shown in the photo.
descriptions.short: The Hanky Code Catsuit is based on our most popular Neo Catsuit with a double band of colour on the bicep.

descriptions.full: The Harrison Catsuit features a striped design across the arms and chest. Available with a variety of zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Grey (second colour) and Metallic Blue (trim). Also in Yellow (main colour) with Orange (second colour) with Natural Green (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Harrison Catsuit features a striped design across the arms and chest.

descriptions.full:
This fully customised catsuit features a digit of your choice as well as simple text on the back! Choose a short word to make your statement known! The Hastings Digit Catsuit has a sport vibe and includes handy front pockets. Only available with front zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). Also in Metallic Green (main colour) with White (second colour).
Text Note: Text is a maximum of 10 characters long, and can include numbers and special characters. Please note, a longer word will result in a smaller text. Font will be in a standard varsity style. Text is included in the price but is not required, therefore if the option is left blank, the item will come without text at the same cost.
descriptions.short: This fully customised catsuit features a digit of your choice as well as simple text on the back!

descriptions.full: The Heart Rate Catsuit features a vertical heartbeat laser cut for precision. The applique also continues down the sleeves. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (trim). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Semi Trans Vibrant Orange (trim, this colour is backed onto white). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Heart Rate Catsuit features a vertical heartbeat laser cut for precision.

descriptions.full:
This is no spiderman outfit! The Huntsman Catsuit features a huge menacing spider motif on the front of our Duke Catsuit base. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Metallic Peacock (main colour) with Orange (second colour). Only available with Back Zip options, please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available, or second colour.
Only available in Regular length.
descriptions.short: This is no spiderman outfit! The Huntsman Catsuit features a huge menacing spider motif on the front of our Duke Catsuit base. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (mainc olour) with Red (second colour). Also in Metallic Peacock (main colour) with Orange (second colour). Only available with Back Zip options, please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available, or second colour. Only available in Regular length.

descriptions.full: A stunning catsuit made to stand out in the crowd. The Kaiser Catsuit features decorative straps across the front which can also be removed. The top f the catsuit includes a smart shirt collar and epaulettes. The standout feature of this catsuit includes the tailcoat design at the back. Only available with front zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour) and Metallic Old Gold (trim). Also in Plum (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (Second colour) and Electric Rose (trim). Only available in Regular Length.
descriptions.short: The standout feature of this catsuit includes the tailcoat design at the back.

descriptions.full:
The Label Catsuit lets you customise the name tag on the front! Available with a variety of zips, Please note the zips match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour) with the customised names "TERRY" and "MASTER". Also in Yellow (main colour) with Black (second colour) with the customised name "SLUT", and in Royal Blue (main colour) with Black (second colour) with the customised name "PUPPY". Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
Text Note: Text is a maximum of 9 characters long, and can include numbers and special characters. Please note, a longer word will result in a smaller text and is case sensitive. Font will be in Ariel Bold style. Text is included in the price.
descriptions.short: The Label Catsuit lets you customise the name tag on the front!

descriptions.full: Available with a variety of zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour) and Metallic Red (trim). Also in Nightshade Blue (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour) with Light Blue (trim). Currently only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: Available with a variety of zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour.

descriptions.full:
The Linear Catsuit features on simple bold stripe across the chest and following into the arms. The stripe also features on the back. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Turquoise (trim). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) and Red (second colour).
 Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
descriptions.short: The Mika Catsuit has a geometric shaped design in two contrasting colours.

descriptions.full: Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Lucifer Catsuit features a unique contrasting design on the front and back and continuing through to the sleeves and thighs

descriptions.full: The Maverick Catsuit introduces a new seamless collar design. The catsuit also features contrasting raglan sleeves and crotch panel . Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). And in Red (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Red (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Maverick Catsuit introduces a new seamless collar design and contrasting sleeves and crotch.

descriptions.full: The Menace Catsuit features 3 stripes over the chest and arms. Only available with back zip options, please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Red (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Menace Catsuit features 3 stripes over the chest and arms.

descriptions.full: The Napoleo catsuit is a two tone catsuit with a third contrasting trim tracing the panelled design. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour) and White (trim). Also in Metallic Green (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) and Black (trim colour).
descriptions.short: The Napoleo catsuit is a two tone catsuit with a third contrasting trim tracing the panelled design.

descriptions.full: The Nocturne Catsuit adds a touch of bondage to your look. It features 5 buckle straps on the front. It also features a folded down colour to reveal a flash of colour. Only available with front zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Pewter (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) with Red (trim). Also in Black (main colour) with Olive green (second colour) and Metallic Old Gold (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Nocturne Catsuit adds a touch of bondage to your look with 5 buckle straps on the front.

descriptions.full: The Overture Catsuit features bondage style buckle straps across the front. Only available with back zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) second colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (trim). Also in Bronze (main colour) with Black (trim). Currently only available in Regular Length.
descriptions.short: The Overture Catsuit features bondage style buckle straps across the front.

descriptions.full:
This streamlined looking catsuit features a number of contrasting trims along the side body and chest. The Panorama Catsuit also includes a relaxed shaped collar for a comfortable fit. Available with back zip options only, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow(second colour).
Only available in regular length. 
Please note, if translucent vibrant colours are choosen for the trim, it wil doubled onto white to make them opaque.

descriptions.full: The Pentagram Catsuit features a symbolic pentagram motif. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour). Also in White (main colour) with Black (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Pentagram Catsuit features a symbolic pentagram motif.

descriptions.full: This Proton Catsuit comes without a collar so can be pulled on without zips! The contrasting raglan sleeves updates a simple catsuit with a flash of colour. Also available with a variety of zips, Please note the zips match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Raspberry Pink (second colour). And in Metallic Purple (main colour) with Electric Rose (second colour). Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
descriptions.short: This Proton Catsuit comes without a collar so can be pulled on without zips!

descriptions.full: A Mod style Catsuit with a classic bulls-eye logo incorporated into the design. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour), White (third colour) and Metallic Red (trim). Also in Black (main colour), Pearlsheen Silver (second colour), White (third colour) and Black (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: A Mod style Catsuit with a classic bulls-eye logo incorporated into the design

descriptions.full: This multi-panelled catsuit features blocks in two contrasting colours. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Green (second colour). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Metallic Petrol Blue (second colour). Only in regular length.
descriptions.short: This multi-panelled catsuit features blocks in two contrasting colours.

descriptions.full: The Rinzler Catuit introduces a new seamless collar neckline. The seams are trimmed in a contrasting colour to emphasize the unique shape. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Rinzler Catuit introduces a new seamless collar neckline. The seams are trimmed in a contrasting colour to emphasize the unique shape.

descriptions.full:
The Shoulder Zip Catsuit is our skin tight Neo Catsuit with an easy access shoulder zip opening. The zips open from the side of the neck at the beginning of the collar and end at the middle bicep. A crotch zip can also be added for easy access. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Black (zip colour). Also in Yellow (main colour) with Black (zip colour).Please note, in this catsuit you have the option to choose the zip colour. 
Available in Petite, Regular and Tall.
descriptions.short: The Shoulder Zip Catsuit is our skin tight Neo Catsuit with an easy access shoulder zip opening.

descriptions.full:
The Sirocco Catsuit features an edgy design mirrored on the front and back. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Plum (main colour) with Lilac (second colour). Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available, or second colour.
Only available in Regular Length.
descriptions.short: The Sirocco Catsuit features an edgy design mirrored on the front and back.

descriptions.full:
An addition to the space style catsuits. The Skywalker Catsuit features bold panels across the chest and arms for a robotic look. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) second colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in White (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour).
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Skywalker Catsuit features bold panels across the chest and arms for a robotic look.

descriptions.full: A military style addition to the male catsuit range. The Soldier Catsuit features 2 working front pockets and a integrated belt in contrasting colours. It also includes military style epaulettes and faux bicep bands. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Olive Green (main colour), Red (second colour) with Black (trim). Also in Black (main colour), Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) with Metallic Blue (trim). Only available with front zip options. Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available, or trim colour.

The Stargate Catsuit features robotic style panels lined in a contrasting colour. We think it looks great with metallic or vibrant colours. Only available with back zip options, Please note zips match (or close match) main colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (trim).
Only available in regular length.
Please note, if vibrant translucent colours are choosen for trim, these will be backed onto white to make them opaque.
descriptions.short: The Stargate Catsuit features robotic style panels lined in a contrasting colour. We think it looks great with metallic or vibrant colours.

descriptions.full: A star studded addition to the catsuit range. The Starsky Catsuit features a strip of laser cut stars down the side and sleeves. Available with a variety of zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Black (second colour) and Yellow (trim). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with White (second colour) and Red (trim). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Starsky Catsuit features a strip of laser cut stars down the side and sleeves.

descriptions.full: A fantastic asymmetric catsuit with bucked shoulder straps and detailed thigh design. Also in Metallic Purple (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour).

Made in 0.40mm latex with a thicker collar. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour). Also in Metallic Pewter (main colour) with Lilac (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Summit Catsuit features an angular pattern across the chest, arms and legs.

descriptions.full: Only available in regular length.

Only available in regular length.

The Turbo Boost Catsuit features a futuristic torso panelled design that is extended to the arms and legs. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Red (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Turquoise (second colour).

Also in Plum (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour).
Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Zeo Catsuit gives a streamline silhouette with a contrasting stripe down the centre front, sleeves and legs.

descriptions.full:
A long sleeve catsuit with contrasting shoulder zips that can be opened fully from the neck to arm. The Shoulder Zip Cycle Top also comes with a high neck collar and contrasting coloured cuffs to match the zipper colour. Zips are only available in a limited amount of colours.
Please note, the zip colours are described to match our latex colour chart, "metallic" zip does not mean the zip is metallic, it only means it matches our metallic rubber.

Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Royal Blue (second colour). Also in Supatex Purple (main colour) with Metallic Platinum (second colour). Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: The Infernum Catsuit features a front chest harness with a centre O-ring

descriptions.full:
The impressive Inflatable Catsuit is a full body catsuit with the ability to inflate. Squeeze into the first layer of the catsuit and zip up the back ready to inflate. Interior made in 0.40mm, exterior made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in black and worn with our Male Ankle Socks, Inflatable Balloon Mitts and Inflatable Radical Hood. All sold separately.
Our inflatables are made with a Presta Valve which can be used with a simple bicycle pump or an air compressor for bigger items. Please do not over inflate.
descriptions.short: The impressive Inflatable Catsuit is a full body catsuit with the ability to inflate.

descriptions.full: This Catsuit is a basic Neo catsuit with no feet and shoulder zip entry. It also features fully functioning slanted tit zips, wrist zips and ankle zips as well as our new design of removable cod piece. The cod piece features sturdy press stud fastenings and is completely removable with a reinforced cut out underneath. Catsuit comes as seen with all features. Shown here in black, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the menu.
descriptions.short: This Catsuit is a basic Neo catsuit with no feet and shoulder zip entry, featuring fully functioning slanted tit zips, wrist zips and ankle zips as well as our new design of removable cod piece.

descriptions.full: A horizontal heart rate laser cut for precision. The Pulse Catsuit also features buckles collar and cuffs for extra detail and lower arm and leg contrasting zips. Only available with back zip options, Please note the zip will match (or close match) the main colour if available. Wrist and Ankle zips match second colour. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in White (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) and Yellow (second colour). Only available in regular length.

descriptions.short: This naughty catsuit is based on our tight fitting Neo Catsuit, with a generous cut out crotch from front to back.

Please select from garment options.
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi trans Natural.
descriptions.short: A clever combination of our Zipper Shirt and our Neo Catsuit, the Neo Shirt Collar Catsuit looks good zipped-up or undone at the collar.

Also in Electric Rose (main colour) with Electric Blue (trim).

(please note the last press stud is fixed, please take care when opening)

Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). Also in Plum (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Only available with back zip options. Please note the zip will match (or close match) the second colour if available, or main colour.

The Vest Catsuit features a cool sleeveless and low neckline top half. Can be made with a variety of zip options. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black, and also in Electric Blue. Can also be ordered with a trim (insert link).

descriptions.short: The Vest Catsuit features a cool sleeveless and low neckline top half.

Available in Petite, Regular and Tall
descriptions.short: A trimmed version of our Vest Catsuit

Only available in regular length.
descriptions.short: This simple wrestler catsuit has a low neckline and the straps cross over the back.

descriptions.full: The super low cut Luchador Catsuit! This Y-back catsuit features a crotch zip running from front to back, and a contrasting trim. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: The super low cut Luchador Catsuit!

descriptions.full: A handy catsuit with a little pocket, suitable for a credit card and any other small essentials. The short crotch zip is concealed with a fly. A super low cut style, with a y-back design, perfect if you still want to wear a catsuit in the summer! Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Peacock and Black trim.
descriptions.short: A handy catsuit with a little pocket, suitable for a credit card and any other small essentials.

descriptions.full: Our most classic female dress made to fit the male figure! The Male Princess Dress features Princess style seams running vertically through the dress. It comes with zip and sleeve options to create the best style for you! Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black and worn with our Male Tights in Bubblegum Pink.
descriptions.short: Our most classic female dress made to fit the male figure!

descriptions.full:
This Decadent Dress shirt features a striped front with a bold bib design for completely twisted look! Choose two complementary colours for a striking combination.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Honey (main colour) with Black (second colour), Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour) and in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Metallic Pewter (second colour). Please note, press studs come Black as standard, however we do have coloured press studs available. If you would like your press studs to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Our model measures 100cm chest (medium), he is wearing a size small for a tighter fit - the choice is yours! 
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.

This shirt has snap fasteners down the front and on the cuffs and is finished off with a wing collar. Tie not included.Seen here in White with Translucent Natural (secondary colour) and Black with Translucent Smoky Black (secondary colour). Seen in here with our Classic Jeans, Sinatra Trousers and Astaire trousers.
The shirt is made to be slightly longer than normal so can be tucked into trousers.

Please note, press studs come Black as standard, however we do have coloured press studs available. If you would like your press studs to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.

Available as Ritz Dress Shirt (Short Sleeve). Seen here with Sinatra Trousers.

A pull on top with a dandy apperance. The Dickie Dress Top features a vertical striped tuxedo bib and include matching flat collar and bow! The cuffs include 2 press studs.

descriptions.full: Our popular Burlesque Suspender Dress tailored for men! This sexy little number comes with a harness style top half and 4 suspender clips, suitable for many styles of stockings, including latex. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: This sexy little number comes with a harness style top half and 4 suspender clips, suitable for many styles of stockings.

descriptions.full: A cheeky little number from our female range. The Male Decadence Dress is tailored for the male figure. This bum skimming dress features an open cup harness design at the chest. It can come with a short back zip. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black.

descriptions.full: A daring version of our Hospital Gown! The Hospital Top just about covers up your modesty but still features the open back design! The top is tied at the back with latex strings and is trimmed around the neck and cuffs. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Light Blue with White Trim.
descriptions.short: A daring version of our Hospital Gown!

descriptions.full:
A simple tight fitting rubber top with an attached Neo Hood and Gloves. The top is fastened at the back with a long zip with two sliders. 
Please note: Gloves are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural. Please let us know the size and colour you need.
The attached hood is available in 3 sizes:
S/M
Forehead 53cm - 56cm (21" - 22") Neck 29cm - 32cm (11.5" - 12.5")
M/L
Forehead 57cm - 60cm (22.5" - 23.5") Neck 32cm - 36cm (12.5" - 14")
L/XL
Forehead 61cm - 64cm (24" - 25") Neck 37cm - 41cm (14.5" - 16")
 
Gloves
Small = 17cm - 20cm palm circumference Medium = 20cm - 23cm palm circumference Large = 23cm - 26cm palm circumference
descriptions.short: A simple tight fitting rubber top with an attached Neo Hood and Gloves.

descriptions.full: Keep your hands bound with this simple short body bag. This top features two eyelet belt details on the hip bone. Fastens at the back with a full length zip. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black.

descriptions.short: The Binder top featuring an added D-ring at the tip of the fingers for an extra bondage look.

It also features heavy duty straps around the crotch and more D-rings on shoulders, elbows and waist. With an open end Back zip. Seen here in Black, and worn with our Pouch Shorts.
descriptions.short: A standard version of a straitjacket, this top is made from 0.4mm so is easier to wear.

descriptions.full: You can wear our Tracksuit Top either with the matching Tracksuit Trousers or with any of our collection of Trousers and Shorts, for a cool, street-wise look. With sewn elasticated waistband and cuffs. Also a  full pull-up hood with drawstring, it's a true latex take on one of today's most popular designs. Seen here with our Garage Jeans.

        IMPORTANT INFORMATIONBelow are some key points briefly explained. For full details you must go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.
Discreet PackagingYour discretion is one of our main priorities so please be assured, all our goods are sent in plain packaging, with just a staff member's name as the sender and our address.
Production Delivery, Dispatch Time & Rapid Order Service All our garments are hand-made, and production is now taking 2 to 4 weeks during this busy Sales period. If you need your goods urgently we offer a quick production service called 'Rapid Order' (This is a guaranteed 10 working day production and dispatch service which is charged at an extra 30% of the original price of the item- not the discounted price).PLEASE SEE CHECKOUT PAGE FOR AVAILABILITY OF THIS SERVICE. 
Delivery time is additional to production time and depends on your location. For Non-UK customers we recommend that you choose courier if you need a quicker delivery.
Returning GoodsBefore returning any items, please contact us and we'll guide you through the return process. You must contact us within 7 days after receiving your goods.
Latex Allergy - Natural Rubber Latex Allergy Latex Garments are produced from Natural Rubber Latex (NRL). NRL is an integral part of thousands of everyday consumer and healthcare items. The proteins contained within NRL can cause allergic reactions to Latex. More than 40,000 products used in homes, schools and medical settings contain latex, including common items such as: condoms, rubber bands, balloons, surgical and examination gloves, clothing elastic, etc. Latex allergy, or hypersensitivity, occurs when the body's immune system reacts to proteins found in NRL. Some individuals have specific antibodies, called IgE antibodies, that make them hypersensitive to the proteins in NRL. Although we take great care to use latex sheeting that has been 'leached' to a high level, to remove the proteins to a legally acceptable standard, the onus is on you the consumer to ensure that you do not have this problem prior to purchasing or wearing latex clothing. (Please note, that in over 25 years of our company selling latexwear we have never received any complaints of allergy caused by our clothing.)
These are only some key points briefly explained. For full details please go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.

For a truly arresting look, it's hard to beat this simple but effective police-style shirt. The shirt features a full-length zipper, real breast pocket with snap fastener, epaulettes and insignia. Please note this item will always feature Black buttons and Black zipper.
Shown here in Light Blue with Royal Blue trim, but available in other colours. Seen here with our Classic jeans and Eyelet Belt.
descriptions.short: For a truly arresting look, it's hard to beat this simple but effective police-style shirt.

descriptions.full:
A simple pull on top with contrasting shoulder zips that can be opened fully from the neck to arm. The Shoulder Zip Cycle Top also comes with a high neck collar and matching coloured press studs are used for a tidy finish. 
Zips are only available in a limited amount of colours. Please note, the zip colours are described to match our latex colour chart, "metallic" zip does not mean the zip is metallic, it only means it matches our metallic rubber. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in White (main colour) with Black (zip colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Red (zip colour).
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A simple pull on top with contrasting shoulder zips that can be opened fully from the neck to arm.

descriptions.full:
A round collar pull on top with contrasting coloured press stud seams along the shoulder and side. The asymmetric design has working press studs all the way from the neck to arm so opens up fully. All the side seam press studs open apart from the top one, please take care when opening.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). And in Jade Green (main colour) with White (second colour). Press studs match the main colour, if the main colour you want is not available, this is because we dont have matching press studs. 
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A round collar pull on top with contrasting coloured press stud seams along the shoulder and side.

descriptions.full:
An attractive, close-fitting short sleeved top. Our Speedster Zipper Top features a wide double-stripe design down both sides of the full-length front zip and a broad trim on the cuffs in a contrasting colour. Shown here in Black with Contrasting trim in Metallic Peacock, but any combination of colours is possible. Shown here with our Narrow Leg Jeans and Eyelet Belt, this top goes well with our range of Trousers and Shorts.
Now updated with length sizes! 
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: Our Speedster Zipper Top features a wide double-stripe design down both sides of the full-length front zip and a broad trim on the cuffs in a contrasting colour.

descriptions.full: A funky Zipper top with a large tribal design on the front and back that could resemble a devilish figure. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) and Metallic Silver (second colour)
descriptions.short: A funky Zipper top with a large tribal design on the front and back that could resemble a devilish figure.

descriptions.full:
This 3 toned Zipper top featuring contrasting panels across the front and back shoulders. Choose your favourite three colours to produce your own unique look.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour), White (second colour) and Plum (third colour). Also in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour), Yellow (second colour) and Lilac (third colour). Please note, zip come Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: Choose your favourite three colours to produce your own unique look.

descriptions.full:
A striking and bold zipper top with a big v-shaped contrasting panel on the front with short sleeves.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm. Seen here in Silver (main colour) and Turquoise (second colour).Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A striking and bold zipper top with a big v-shaped contrasting panel on the front

descriptions.full:
A round collared Zipper top with a fun zig-zag design across the front and back. Comes with a full length front zip and short sleeves.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex with a 0.80mm collar. Seen here in Metallic Red (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Translucent Natural (main colour) with Black (second colour). Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A round collared Zipper top with a fun zig-zag design across the front and back.

descriptions.full:
A classic zipper top which goes well with any Trousers and Shorts. It's skin tight and designed to show off the figure to best effect, it also has a full-length zipper fastening running right up the front and through the collar. Shown here in the Sleeveless version with our Supertight Jeans and Parade Trousers.
Now Available in extra sizes as well as Petite, Regular and Tall. 
Please note: Length is measured from centre of collar bone to hem, regardless of where the neckline starts. 
Now available in different thicknesses!
descriptions.short: A classic zipper top which goes well with any Trousers and Shorts, it's skin tight and designed to show off the figure to best effect.

descriptions.full: A long sleeve T-shirt with a Star Trek style. The Trek Top has a contrasting top panel and sleeves. The neckline has a unique V shaped notch on the front. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black with Plum trim.
descriptions.short: A long sleeve T-shirt with a Star Trek style

descriptions.full:
The Turbo Zipper Top is a long sleeve top with a futuristic torso design on the front. It includes a full length front zip. Also available with short sleeves as an option. 
Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Orange (second colour). And in Black (main colour) with Metallic Red (second colour). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) and Metallic Pewter (second colour). Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: The Turbo Zipper Top is a long sleeve top with a futuristic torso design on the front.

descriptions.full: A bondage inspired zipper top with contrasting decorations. The Ministry Zipper Top includes a front zipper and 3 buckles at the front for a super secure look. the shoulders and neckline are finished with a matching trim. made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Red with Black trim.
descriptions.short: A bondage inspired zipper top with contrasting decorations.

descriptions.full: A classic rubber sailor top, complete with a traditional looking sailors collar. The top is cleverly designed to include the faux collar as a part of the top. The hems are finished in a contrasting two stripe trim, and the top is fastened with a zip. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Light Blue (main colour), Royal Blue (second colour) and White (trim).
descriptions.short: A classic looking rubber sailor top, complete with a traditional sailors collar.

descriptions.full: an asymmetric top perfect for a warrior look. The Gladiator Top features a number of working buckles down the side and one over the shoulder. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: The Gladiator Top features a number of working buckles down the side and one over the shoulder.

descriptions.full:
A take on the classic Full Face Hood, this stylish version has applique trim on seam lines in a contrasting colour. It also features heart lip detail with a small drinking hole in the middle. Full extras and options available as with the classic full faced hood. Ponytail also availble in single or double tube. Fastens via back zip. Shown here in black with white trim, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the menu.
S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm
descriptions.short: A take on the classic Full Face Hood, this stylish version has applique trim on seam lines in a contrasting colour.

descriptions.full:
A good fitting full faced hood a with transparent rubber eye cover allowing partial vision. There are many choices of colours for the transparent rubber so please ask. Both mouth and nose openings are reinforced with a facing and the hood is opened using the back zip. A pull-on (zipless) version is available in a thinner more stretchy 0.25mm latex. All hoods can be attached to catsuits. Seen here in Back (main colour) and Translucent Natural (secondary colour). S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm
Primary Colour is for the main part of the hood. Secondary Colour refers to the eye area, please note only transparent colours are partially see through.
descriptions.short: A good fitting full faced hood a with transparent rubber eye cover allowing partial vision.

descriptions.full: A take on the classic Full Face Hood, this stylish version has applique trim on seam lines in a contrasting colour. It features a new style nose with 2 reinforced holes for safer breathing. It also comes with reinforced eyes and mouth openings. Seen here in Black.S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

descriptions.full:
A hood perfect for experienced breath controllers. This hood features a pair of tubes at the nostrils. It is fastened with a zip at the back.
The length of the nostrils tubes is approximately  9 cm and the width: diameter 5mm (inside) and 9mm(outside). Seen here in Black.
Extreme care must be taken when using this product, a trusted partner should always be on hand.S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

descriptions.full: An open faced hood (shown here in black) with an inflatable face bag made in thinner 0.25mm latex, ventilated by two holes. The bag is shown here in Translucent Natural and in Translucent Olive (we have a variety of different transparent colours available), but can also be made in non-transparent colours. The hood is opened using the back zip and is made of standard thickness, 0.40mm rubber. A pull-on (zipless) version is also available in a thinner, more stretchy latex. Hoods in thinner latex are suitable for newcomers and those wanting a more flexible fit. All hoods can be attached to catsuits. Sold as a novelty item only.Extreme care must be taken when using this product, a trusted partner should always be on hand.S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

Comes with a contrasting eye applique around the eyes in the colour of your choice. The nose hole is reinforced with a facing and the hood is opened using the back zip. descriptions.full: Our Pull on Basic Hood as the name suggests is pull on only without a back zip, giving a streamlined smooth look! The Pull on Hood is made from 0.25mm latex, which is easier to pull over the head. Seen here in Translucent Natural, and Translucent Olive.
descriptions.short: Our Neo Hood can also come as a pull on option, meaning there are no zips.

descriptions.full: The Rim Hood comes with an attached contrasting mouth ring. The hood is based on our Neo hood, with the simple nose. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black with Raspberry Pink Trim.S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

descriptions.full: Popular with aficionados of total enclosure, our novelty Sheath Hood is a attractive addition to any rubberist's collection. No eyes or mouth, and with a totally flat front apart from a shaped nose with reinforced nose-holes. The hood is opened using the back zip and is made of standard thickness, 0.40mm rubber. A pull-on (zipless) version is also available in a thinner more stretchy 0.25mm latex. All hoods can be attached to catsuits. Shown here in Black and in Translucent Natural, but different colours are also available - just select your choice from the menu.S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm

descriptions.full:
Go for a fresher, open look with the Shirt Collar Surfsuit, featuring an open-neck shirt-style collar to set off the design. The collar can be closed right up to the neck with the full-length front zip which runs through the crotch and comes with 3 sliders. Also available with Short Sleeves.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.
descriptions.short: Go for a fresher, open look with the Shirt Collar Surfsuit, featuring an open-neck shirt-style collar to set off the design.

descriptions.full:
A long sleeve button shirt with a bold chest harness for an eye catching feature. The harness is connected to the shoulders and sides, and can be opened from the centre ring to access the main button stand.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Plum (main colour) with Silver (second colour). And Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). Please note, press studs come Black as standard, however we do have coloured press studs available. If you would like your press studs to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Our model measures 100cm chest (medium), he is wearing a size small for a tighter fit - the choice is yours! 
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.

Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Silver (second colour). And Metallic Blue (main colour ) with Black (second colour). Please note, press studs come Black as standard, however we do have coloured press studs available. If you would like your press studs to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.

Shown here in Black with Silver and Yellow with Black, but any colour combination is possible Tip: can be worn with denim jeans. Seen here with our Narrow Leg Jeans and Eyelet Belt.

descriptions.full:
Our Long Sleeve Button Shirt is a highly versatile number, blending in well with both smart and casual attire. It's loosely cut but well tailored, with snap fasteners buttoning right up the front and closing the cuffs. The shirt is made to be slightly longer than normal so can be tucked into trousers. As part of a smart outfit, it looks stunning with one of our great selection of Ties, but can also be worn open necked (or completely open!) with our range of Trousers, Jeans & Chaps or even Skirts, Kilts & Aprons. Seen here with our Revelation Kilt, Sinatra trousers, Classic Jeans. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in a variety of colours. 
Measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for inside arm and collar measurements.
descriptions.short: Our Long Sleeve Button Shirt is a highly versatile number, blending in well with both smart and casual attire.

descriptions.full: At home on the range or in the club, our Long Sleeve Cowboy Shirt gives a new look to a traditional Western style. Loose cut and well-finished, it features a trimmed yoke and button stand in contrasting colour and cuffs closed with two-button snap fasteners. Shown here with our  Chunky Belt and Classic Jeans in Metallic Pewter and Black with Metallic Silver trim, but other combinations are available. Also available with Short Sleeves style
descriptions.short: At home on the range or in the club, our Long Sleeve Cowboy Shirt gives a new look to a traditional Western style.

        IMPORTANT INFORMATIONBelow are some key points briefly explained. For full details you must go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.
Discreet PackagingYour discretion is one of our main priorities so please be assured, all our goods are sent in plain packaging, with just a staff member's name as the sender and our address.
Production Delivery, Dispatch Time & Rapid Order Service All our garments are hand-made, and production is now taking 2 to 4 weeks during this busy Sales period. If you need your goods urgently we offer a quick production service called 'Rapid Order' (This is a guaranteed 10 working day production and dispatch service which is charged at an extra 30% of the original price of the item- not the discounted price).PLEASE SEE CHECKOUT PAGE FOR AVAILABILITY OF THIS SERVICE. 
Delivery time is additional to production time and depends on your location. For Non-UK customers we recommend that you choose courier if you need a quicker delivery.
Returning GoodsBefore returning any items, please contact us and we'll guide you through the return process. You must contact us within 7 days after receiving your goods.
Latex Allergy - Natural Rubber Latex Allergy Latex Garments are produced from Natural Rubber Latex (NRL). NRL is an integral part of thousands of everyday consumer and healthcare items. The proteins contained within NRL can cause allergic reactions to Latex. More than 40,000 products used in homes, schools and medical settings contain latex, including common items such as: condoms, rubber bands, balloons, surgical and examination gloves, clothing elastic, etc. Latex allergy, or hypersensitivity, occurs when the body's immune system reacts to proteins found in NRL. Some individuals have specific antibodies, called IgE antibodies, that make them hypersensitive to the proteins in NRL. Although we take great care to use latex sheeting that has been 'leached' to a high level, to remove the proteins to a legally acceptable standard, the onus is on you the consumer to ensure that you do not have this problem prior to purchasing or wearing latex clothing. (Please note, that in over 25 years of our company selling latexwear we have never received any complaints of allergy caused by our clothing.)
These are only some key points briefly explained. For full details please go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.

Text Note: Text is a maximum of 8 characters long, and can include numbers and special characters. Please note, a longer word will result in a smaller text. Font will be in a standard varsity style. Text is included in the price but is not required, therefore if the option is left blank, the item will come without text at the same cost.

descriptions.full:
There's no beating the traditional jeans style and our Classic Jeans offer an unbeatable latex version of this iconic design. With working pockets at front and back, strengthened with rivets in traditional style. The straight cut jeans are our loosest style, that can be worn easily over boots. The broad waistband with belt-loops is closed with a concealed zip fly and snap fasteners. Seen in here with our Armstrong Button Shirt, Long sleeves Button Shirt, Parallel Polo Shirt and Jelly Polo Shirt. 
Size Guide
How to measure your waistline - Our jeans are made to be worn on the lower waist. We have taken this into consideration and disregarded the actual waist measurement. The jeans waistband will measure the larger side of the size chart. So if you would like a tight fit, you can choose to go down a size. You can also measure your favourite pair of jeans along the straight of the waistband and use this as a guide. 
How to measure your hips - Please also measure your hips, also refered to as the seat. This is the line around the crotch, including the widest part of the bum. This will help you determine what size is best if you are between sizes or still unsure. 
How to measure your inside leg - With a tape measure starting at your crotch (as close as possible!) straight down to where you want your trousers to finish. This length may change depending on what type of shoes you are wearing.
descriptions.short: There's no beating the traditional jeans style and our Classic Jeans offer an unbeatable latex version of this iconic design.
