descriptions.full:
A pair of latex jeans to stand out of the crowd! These striped jeans can jazz up any simple jacket, or go all out with double stripes with our striped suit jackets available. It includes two main colour back pockets and a front fly zip.
Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour). Belt is not included.Worn with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt.
descriptions.short: A pair of stripey latex jeans to stand out of the crowd!

descriptions.full: A supertight version of our stripe jeans. The Stripe Skinny Jeans feature wide contrasting stripes on the front and back. The front includes two pockets and a fly zip. the main colour waistband also has handy belt loops. Available in Petite, Tall and Regular. Seen here in Black (main colour) and White, (second colour).
descriptions.short: A pair of stripey Supertight Jeans to stand out of the crowd!

descriptions.full:
These studded jeans feature side seams adorned with flat silver coloured rivets. The Stud Jeans are fastened with matching silver press stud fly. Also includes front and back pockets.
Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black. Worn with Texas Cowboy Shirt and Trimmed Belt (not included).
descriptions.short: These studded jeans feature side seams adorned with flat silver coloured rivets.
These supertight jeans feature a unique fastening decorated with silver press studs

descriptions.full: A version of our Classic Jeans, these Supertight Jeans are close-cut to show off the lower body to best advantage. They feature a wide waistband, belt loops and 1 slimline pocket. Simple but smart, they look great with our Shirts & Waistcoats,Tops and Vests. They do up with a concealed zipper and popper stud on the waistband. Please note: belt is not included. Made in 0.40mm.
descriptions.short: A version of our Classic Jeans, these Supertight Jeans are close-cut to show off the lower body to best advantage.

descriptions.full:
These jeans look like a classic cut pair of trousers from the front, but turn around the reveal a naughty lace-up bum! Looks tantalising without underwear on, or add a flash of colour with red pants underneath like we have! The front includes two pockets and mini d-ring features. Lace is available in limited colours.
Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Black (lace colour).
descriptions.short: These jeans look like a classic cut pair of trousers from the front, but turn around the reveal a naughty lace-up bum!

descriptions.full: A pair of tight fitting leggings based on our popular supertight jeans. The Vertigo Skinny Jeans feature a two tone look with contrasting front and back panels. They are made to fit like leggings, but come with the popular jean fittings, including a handy card-size pocket. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Pewter with Metallic Silver trim.
descriptions.short: The Vertigo Skinny Jeans feature a two tone look with contrasting front and back panels.

descriptions.full: A pair of narrow cut jeans with a wide contrasting stripe on the front. Looks great with a bright trim to stand out! The Viper Jeans also include two front pockets and two back pockets. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (trim colour). Belt not included.
descriptions.short: A pair of narrow cut jeans with a wide contrasting stripe on the front.

descriptions.full: A full-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with four heavy-duty straps with buckles. A perfect combination for clubbing or playing!The skirt comes with a Handy Purse as standard but is also available without. Seen here in Black with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt  in Metallic Pewter and Vector T-Shirt with Trim in Black with Metallic Grey trim.
descriptions.short: A full-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with four heavy-duty straps with buckles.

descriptions.full:
A classic men's skirt - no frills but simple and good-looking. The skirt is finished at the top with a wide waistband closed by two-snap fasteners, and comes complete with snap-fasteners for our Purse, available at extra cost). Shown here with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt  in Metallic Pewter  and Track Polo Shirt in Black with White Trim.
Skirt measures approx 110cm
descriptions.short: A classic men's skirt - no frills but simple and good-looking the skirt is finished at the top with a wide waistband.

descriptions.full: A knee-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with three heavy-duty straps with buckles. Looks great by itself or makes a cool combination with our collection of Tops and Shirt- perfect for clubbing or playing!The skirt comes with a Handy Purse as standard but is also available without. Seen in here with our Zipper Shirt (Short Sleeves) in Black.
descriptions.short: A knee-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with three heavy-duty straps with buckles.

descriptions.full: A calf-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with three heavy-duty straps with buckles. Looks great by itself or makes a cool combination with our collection of Tops and Shirts - perfect for clubbing or playing!The skirt comes with a Handy Purse as standard but is also available without. Seen here in Black with our Track Polo Shirt  in Yellow and Black and Short Sleeves Button Shirt  in Black.
descriptions.short: A calf-length, wrap-around skirt fixed with three heavy-duty straps with buckles.

descriptions.full: A full-length wrap-around skirt made from thick latex to hold its shape, our Play Skirt is ideal for the club scene - the playroom or the bedroom! It's fastened with popper studs on the inside and outside of the waistband and can be easily opend. Looks great with by itself or with any of our Tops, seen here with our  Vector T-Shir WithTrim  in Black with Red Trimming and also a Black Y Back Vest .
descriptions.short:
A full-length wrap-around skirt made from thick latex to hold its shape, our Play Skirt is ideal for the club scene - the playroom or the bedroom.
Skirt measures approx. 70cm

descriptions.full: A knee-length wrap-around skirt made from thick latex to hold its shape. Our Play Skirt is ideal for the club scene, the playroom or the bedroom! It's fastened with popper studs on the inside and outside of the waistband and can be easily removed. Looks great by itself or with any of our collection of Tops and Vests. Seen in here with our Short Sleeves Zipper Shirt in Black.
descriptions.short:
A knee-length wrap-around skirt made from thick latex to hold its shape, our Play Skirt is ideal for the club scene, the playroom or the bedroom.
Skirt measures approx. 55cm

descriptions.full: A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit. Comes with a pouch and it's available with a back or front zip. Also available in a Low Cut version. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Blue.
descriptions.short: A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit.

descriptions.full: A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit. A well-tailored leotard where we've kept the seams to the minimum (look closely and you'll see there are no horizontal seams at all!). Comes with a pouch and is available with a back or front zip. Also available in a High Cut version. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Blue.
descriptions.short: A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit.

descriptions.full: A leotard version of our much loved Duke Catsuit. The Duke Leotard features the same princess style lines. Also available in a High Cut version. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Black.
descriptions.short: A leotard version of our much loved Duke Catsuit.

descriptions.full: A leotard version of our much loved Duke Catsuit. This leotard comes with a pouch. Also available without the pouch, please see our Duke Leotard. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Olive.
descriptions.short: This leotard comes with a pouch.

descriptions.full: A leotard version of our much loved Duke Catsuit. This low cut leotard comes with a pouch. Also available in a High Cut version. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Olive, and in Translucent Smokey Black.
descriptions.short: This low cut leotard comes with a pouch.

descriptions.full:
A feminine fitting leotard for the male figure! This Seduction Leotard features shaped cups to enhance the bust, that look perfect when filled with many types of breast forms. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Black.
Please note: If you are ordering your catsuit with attached gloves they come in Small 7, Medium 8 and Large 9, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Pearlsheen Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural. If choosing attached hoods, please be aware the catsuit will be made with a Back through crotch zip. Please give us the size and colour details of the hoods and the gloves in the space for the Notes.
descriptions.short: A feminine fitting leotard for the male figure!

descriptions.full:
A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit. A well-tailored leotard where we've kept the seams to the minimum (look closely and you'll see there are no horizontal seams at all!). Available with a back or front zip. Also available in a High Cut version. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Black.
Please note we don't recommend front zip and horizontal breast zips together as the front of the leotard will be very busy.
descriptions.short: A leotard version of our ever so popular Neo Catsuit.

descriptions.full: A short sleeve leotard with a cheeky jockstrap bottom! Comes with a long front zip. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: A short sleeve leotard with a cheeky jockstrap bottom!

basics.name: Sleeveless Neo Leotard (With Pouch) High Cut

descriptions.full:
Based on the design for our Neo Catssuit with pouch. The Neo Leotard (high cut) is a sleek, well-tailored garment where we've kept the seams to the minimum (look closely and you'll see there are no horizontal seams at all!). Available with a back or front zip.
PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, 
                              Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
descriptions.short: Based on the design for our Neo Catsuit with pouch, The Neo Leotard is a sleek, well-tailored garment where we've kept the seams to the minimum (look closely and you'll see there are no horizontal seams at all).

descriptions.full: A sleeveless leotard with a jockstrap backside! The leotard can come with a long front zip, or its possible to come zipless and enter through he wide neck opening. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in black.
descriptions.short: A sleeveless leotard with a jockstrap backside!

descriptions.full: A sleeveless leotard with contrasting seams and edges. The Sleeveless Jockstrap Leotard come features a shameless jockstrap backside. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Blue with Light Blue trim.
descriptions.short: The Sleevless Jockstrap Leotard come features a shameless jockstrap backside.

descriptions.full: A heavy rubber biker jacket complete with fierce spikes! This jacket features 4 decorative pocket flaps and a heavy metal zip. The sleeves are also finished with matching zips at the cuffs. made in 0.80mm latex. Shown here in Black. Seen here with our Codpiece Jeans
descriptions.short: A heavy rubber biker jacket complete with fierce spikes!

descriptions.full: A simple version of our College Jacket. The Baseball Jacket comes in one colour and has sufficient sized front pockets. Made In 0.50mm latex. Shown  in Black. Seen in here with our Racer Slim Fit Jeans
descriptions.short: A simple version of our College Jacket.

descriptions.full: A sporty looking zipper jacket. The Chase Jacket features big pocket on the front in a contrasting colour. It also has a smart contrasting shirt collar and cuffs. The sleeves are loose fitted for a casual look. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Black with Black trim.
descriptions.short: A sporty looking zipper jacket.

descriptions.full: A tight fitting latex college jacket with a custom option! This sporty jacket comes with one letter of your choice in a contrasting colour to match the trims. It also comes with small pockets on the front. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black with Metallic Blue trim, with our Classic Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: This sporty jacket comes with one letter of your choice in a contrasting colour to match the trims.

descriptions.full: A belted military style rubber jacket. The Corporal Jacket has cleverly concealed popper fastening and 4 generously sized pockets. The coat is complete with a belt for the waist. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Petrol Blue with our Classic Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: The Corporal Jacket has cleverly concealed popper fastening and 4 generously sized pockets.

descriptions.full: An attractive rubber biker style jacket complete with a number of pockets. The Freddie Jacket is zipped up the centre front with complementing zip pocket on the chest. Comes with Black zips as standard. Two small pockets are perfect for stashing away your small items. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Old Gold with our Jockey Skinny Jeans  in Black with Metallic Old Gold trim.
descriptions.short: An attractive rubber biker style jacket complete with a number of pockets.

descriptions.full: A colourful twist on a biker jacket. The Harley Biker Jacket features metal zips that open to expose the skin underneath. The sleeves, hem and collar are made in a contrasting colour. Made in 0.80mm latex. seen here in Black (Main Colour) and Metallic Red (Trim Colour) with our Classic Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: The Harley Biker Jacket features metal zips that open to expose the skin underneath.

descriptions.full: A rubber biker jacket with studded shoulders. The Jagger Jacket features a racer style collar and an asymmetric metal side front zip. The cuff of the sleeves are have metal zips. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black with our Classic Jeans in Electric Blue
descriptions.short: A rubber biker jacket with studded shoulders.

descriptions.full: A loose-cut but well-tailored jean-style jacket with long sleeves. Closed down the front with snap-fasteners, which also close the breast pockets and cuffs, seen here in Black. Looks good with our Classic Jeans or even with your own denims! Also available Sleevless.
descriptions.short: A loose-cut but well-tailored jean-style jacket with long sleeves, closed down the front with snap-fasteners, which also close the breast pockets and cuffs.

descriptions.full: A modern update to a classic latex biker jacket. This racer style jacket features a side front heavy metal zip and with zipped pockets. It also has a racer style collar. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black with our Codpiece Jeans  also in Black and Male Leggings  in Metallic Pewter.
descriptions.short: This racer style jacket features a side front heavy metal zip and with zipped pockets.

descriptions.full: Prepare to take control in this vintage inspired Military Jacket. The striking jacket is adorned with Buckles down the front, and is cropped at the front of the waist. The contrasting cuffs and epaulettes finish of the design. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Red with Black trim, with our Classic Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: The striking jacket is adorned with Buckles down the front, and is cropped at the front of the waist.

descriptions.full: A charming button up rubber jacket. The Presley Jacket features a button up opening with a smart collar and deep pockets on the front. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black, with our Classic jeans also in Black.
descriptions.short: The Presley Jacket features a button up opening with a smart collar and deep pockets on the front.

descriptions.full: A well tailored jacket with a military feel. The Sergeant Jacket is fastened at the front with large metal poppers, and features a smart shirt collar. The rubber coat is decorated with contrasting shoulder and elbow patches to match. The pockets are non-functional! Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Chocolate with Metallic Old Gold trim, with our Classic Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: The Sergeant Jacket is fastened at the front with large metal poppers, and features a smart shirt collar.

descriptions.full: A loose College style jacket with wonderful contrasting colours. The detailed jacket is easily buttoned up the front and include small pockets. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Red with White trim, with our Classic Jeans in Black and Zipper Cycle Short in white.
descriptions.short: A loose College style jacket with wonderful contrasting colours.

descriptions.full: A loose-cut but well-tailored jeans-style jacket with short sleeves. Closed down the front with snap-fasteners, which also close the breast pockets and cuffs. Looks good with our Standard Jeans or even with your own denims! Also available with Long Sleeve, seen here with our Sinatra Trousers in Black.
descriptions.short: A loose-cut but well-tailored jeans-style jacket with short sleeves which is closed down the front with snap-fasteners, which also close the breast pockets and cuffs.

descriptions.full: A truly traditional design featuring full-length tails, this Astaire Jacket is closed at the front by two snap fasteners and has matching snaps on the cuffs, decorative butons finish off a half-belt detail on the back. There is also a working breast pocket, ideal for one of our Hankies. Seen here in Black and  shown with Astaire Trousers in Black, with Dress Shirt in White - but also looks great with non-latex trousers or shirt! Bow tie not included.
descriptions.short: A truly traditional design featuring full-length tails, this Astaire Jacket is closed at the front by two snap fasteners and has matching snaps on the cuffs.

descriptions.full: A stylish take on a biker jacket. This heavy rubber jacket features a smart looking collar and a contrasting heavy metal zip. It also has two decorative pockets flaps. Made in 0.80mm latex. Shown here  with our Codpiece Jeans  in Black and also with our Male Leggings  in Metallic Pewter.
descriptions.short: This heavy rubber jacket features a smart looking collar and a contrasting heavy metal zip.

descriptions.full: At home in almost any situation, our Bond Jacket is a highly versatile garment. Looking good as part of a formal suit, or equally cool as a casual outfit. Well tailored to flatter the body shape, it comes in either a single colour or with contrasting collar and pocket flaps. Seen here in Metallic Green (Main Colour) and Metallic  Grey (Trim Colour) and also in Black (Main Colour) and Metallic Pewter (Trim Colour). It is fastened at the front with three popper-studs. Shown here with Sinatra Trousers, Narrow Leg Jeans, Dress Shirt, Plain Tie  and Long Sleeve Button Shirt.
descriptions.short: At home in almost any situation, our Bond Jacket is a highly versatile garment.

descriptions.full: For the true latex sophisticate our Capone Jacket offers the ultimate in classic style. Tailored from heavy latex to ensure it keeps its shape, the suit features a working breast pocket (ideal for one of our Pocket Hanky) and is finished in traditional style with two rows of buttons down the front and a double vent at the back. Looks great with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt  , Plain Tie and ClubTie. Can be worn with any of our selection of Trousers, or even with non-latex items! Seen in here in Metallic Peacock(Main Colour) and Black(Trim Colour), and also in Plain Black.
descriptions.short: For the true latex sophisticate our Capone Jacket offers the ultimate in classic style.

descriptions.full: A rockabilly style jacket. The Jackson Jacket is cropped at the waist and features large metal poppers down the front. Two big pockets are sufficient enough for important items and the shoulders are decorated with epaulettes. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black with our Classic Jeans in Electric Blue and in Metallic Red (Main Colour) and Metallic Honey (Trim Colour) with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt  in Metallic Pewter and Narrow Leg Jeans in Black.
descriptions.short: The Jackson Jacket is cropped at the waist and features large metal poppers down the front.

descriptions.full: A cropped military style rubber jacket decorated in pockets galore! The Sherman Jacket is tight fitting, fastened at the front with large metal poppers. The front includes 2 big pockets and 2 smaller pockets above the chest. made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Olive Green and in Metallic Green with Metallic Pewter trim, with our Classic Jeans in Black and Metallic Pewter and also with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt  in White.
descriptions.short: The Sherman Jacket is tight fitting, fastened at the front with large metal poppers.

descriptions.full: Smart and casual, our Sinatra Jacket comes in two versions to suit the mood: either in a straightforward single colour or with contrasting pocket flaps and collar. It comes with a working breast pocket and has a single vent at the back. The front is closed with three snap-fasteners. Seen in here in Metallic Honey with our Long Sleeve Button Shirt and Sinatra Trousers in Black, Narrow Leg Jeans in Royal Blue  and Plain Tie in Metallic Honey.
descriptions.short: Smart and casual, our Sinatra Jacket comes in two versions to suit the mood: either in a straightforward single colour or with contrasting pocket flaps and collar.

descriptions.full: A unique pair of leggings with an attached corset! The all-in-one Male Corset Leggings create a statement look when worn on its own! They are fastened with a zip running down the back and through the crotch, featuring 3 sliders allowing an opening anywhere along the length of the zip. Thise Leggings can come in a choice of two colours! The main colour refers to the leg colour, second colour refers to the corset colour. The legs are made in 0.40mm latex, and the corset is made in 0.80mm latex. Great paired with our Georgia Neck Corset. Seen here in Translucent Black (main colour) and Black (second colour). And Black (main colour) with Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: A unique pair of leggings with an attached corset!

descriptions.full: A simple but effective waist-constricting corset belt featuring metal front zip. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: A simple but effective waist-constricting corset belt.

descriptions.full:
A new addition to our growing Male Corset Range. This Bondage Corset is inspired by our much loved Female Miranda Corset, but with extra D-rings for clipping and tying your sub into place. The corset includes the traditional lacing at the back, and it fastened at the front with a zip and 3 buckles. Made in 2.10mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Pewter.
The measurements below refer to our Bondage Corset size. To achieve a classic corset waist, traditionally you would pick a size that is 4 inches smaller than your actual waist measurement. However, if you are not comfortable with this reduction, please pick a size that is closer to your actual waist measurement.
XS   = 24" (61cm) S      = 26" (66cm)M     = 28" (71cm)L      = 30" (76cm)XL   = 32.5" (82cm)XXL = 35" (88cm)
descriptions.short: This corset includes the traditional lacing at the back, and it fastened at the front with a zip and 3 buckles.

descriptions.full:
A long awaited male corset! This corset produces a satisfying tight fit, with the male figure in mind. Just like our female corset it is laced up at the back and has clasps at the front. Seen here in Black.
The measurements below refer to our Male Corset size. To achieve a classic corset waist, the corset will have a 4 inch difference from your waist measurement. The following sizes refer to your own body measurements.
descriptions.short: A long awaited male corset!

descriptions.full:
This corset produces a satisfying tight fit, with the male figure in mind. Just like our female corset it is laced up at the back and has a metal zipper at the front. Seen here in Black.
The measurements below refer to our Male Corset size. To achieve a classic corset waist, the corset will have a 4 inch difference from your waist measurement. The following sizes refer to your own body measurements.
descriptions.short: This corset is laced up at the back and has a metal zipper at the front.

descriptions.full:
A strikingly decorated corset! The Zircon Corset is adorned with black pyramid style square studs on the front panels and is fastened with a front zip. The back features the traditional lace-up design. Made in 2.10mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Peacock.
The measurements below refer to our Zircon Corset size. To achieve a classic corset waist, traditionally you would pick a size that is 4 inches smaller than your actual waist measurement. However, if you are not comfortable with this reduction, please pick a size that is closer to your actual waist measurement.
XS   = 24" (61cm) S      = 26" (66cm)M     = 28" (71cm)L      = 30" (76cm)XL   = 32.5" (82cm)XXL = 35" (88cm)3XL = 37" (94cm)4XL = 39.5" (100cm)
descriptions.short: The Zircon Corset is adorned with black pyramid style square studs on the front panels and is fastened with a front zip.

descriptions.full:
A thick rubber collar, perfect for posture control. The Georgia Neck Corset features structured panelling, shaping around the chin and over the mouth. It also has a double buckle fastening at the back. It is made from 2.10mm latex. Seen here in Black.Please refer to the table below for your correct size.
Neck Size
descriptions.short: A thick rubber collar, perfect for posture control.

descriptions.full:
A thick rubber collar, perfect for posture control. The Henrietta Neck Corset features structured panelling, shaping around the chin and over the mouth. It also has metal boning and has a lace up fastening at the back. This Corset includes a large D-ring at the front, suitable for many attachments. It is made from 2.10mm Latex, and the lacing either comes in Black or Red. Seen here in Black with Red lacing. Please refer to the table below for your correct size. 
Neck Size
descriptions.short: A thick rubber collar, perfect for posture control.

descriptions.full:
These leggings come with a shaped waistband and an attached cock and ball sheath. Available with or without feet. Seen here in Black.
Standard Sheath is to fit 6inch in length and 5inch diameter (around). We can supply lengths 4-9inch on request.
descriptions.short: These leggings come with a shaped waistband and an attached cock and ball sheath.

descriptions.full:
A pair of inflatable rubber leggings for maximum curves! The Kimberly leggings are based on a feminine female style with seams at the hips. The leggings are cleverly inflated up to the knee to keep those legs looking slim but hips looking full. Slip into the thin inner layer of the leggings and inflate the outer layer. Interior made in 0.25mm latex, exterior made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in black. 
These are inflated with a traditional football pump. Please do not over inflate.
descriptions.short: A pair of inflatable rubber leggings for maximum curves!

descriptions.full:
The Male Inflatable Leggings are full length leggings with a wide waistband for support. The inner layer is made in 0.40mm latex and the outer layer in 0.50mm latex. They can come with or without zip. Seen here in black.
Our inflatables are made with a Presta Valve which can be used with a simple bicycle pump or an air compressor for bigger items. Please do not over inflate.
descriptions.short: The Male Inflatable Leggings are full length leggings with a wide waistband for support.

descriptions.full: A teasing version of our Male Leggings. These leggings have an attached straight cock sheath (without balls) with an opening at the shaft. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: These leggings have an attached straight cock sheath (without balls) with an opening at the shaft.
These Kilt Leggings are an alternative combination of a kilt and supertight jeans!

descriptions.full: A well fitted pair of rubber leggings with an ample sized cut out bum! The Bum Out Leggings features a waistband and can come with or without feet. made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: A well fitted pair of rubber leggings with an ample sized cut out bum!
These futuristic skin tight leggings feature a trimmed design on the front and back framing the crotch area!

descriptions.full: A fantastic pair of leggings with a harness style feature. These Clencher Leggings include a number of O-rings down the side leg, pulling together a second colour. The front and back are also hoisted up by silver coloured d-rings. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Red (main colour) and Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: These Clencher Leggings include a number of O-rings down the side leg, pulling together a second colour.
These two tone Clockwork Leggings feature a wide stripe on the front with 3 large D-rings.

descriptions.full: Another classic item with a codpiece make-over! Our new Codpiece leggings are simply cut with a detachable codpiece with the reinforced hole. These leggings are based on our Supertight Jeans, and have a waistband with belt loops that fit our Eyelet Belt for example. The Leggings come with a full back zip. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: Our new Codpiece leggings are simply cut with a detachable codpiece with the reinforced hole.

descriptions.full: The Cyber Leggings feature prominent contrasting panels on the front and back. The tight fitting  leggings can be modified to included a crotch zip or without feet. Just choose your options from the menu. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) and Metallic Blue (second colour).
descriptions.short: The Cyber Leggings feature prominent contrasting panels on the front and back.
These pouch leggings have a colourful shaped crotch with a matching backside
These skin tight leggings feature a harness hold up design on the upper thighs.

descriptions.full:
Simple, tight fitting pull-on leggings without zip, for sheer latex pleasure! Also available in a zipped version at extra cost. Available with or without feet. Seen in here with our Money Belt.
Now available in different thicknesses!
descriptions.short: Simple, tight fitting pull-on leggings without zip, for sheer latex pleasure.
These skin tight leggings feature a robotic style design in two contrasting colours

descriptions.full: A sailor inspired pair of leggings. They feature a traditional sailor style drop down front, to reveal what is underneath. The waistband is secured with a set of press studs. These is also a small back pocket for cash and credit cards! Can come with or without feet. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: For those with the sea in their blood, these Sailor Leggings are just the thing for a night out.
These two tone leggings features a shaped pouch around the crotch.

descriptions.full:
A super high waist pair of leggings with a buckled up front. The leggings include a crotch zip that fastens all the way up the front. The 5 buckles can then be fastened over the zip and adjusted.
Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. Made in 0.40mm latex, with a 0.80mm waistband. Seen here in Black. Worn with Long Sleeve Button Shirt.
descriptions.short: A super high waist pair of leggings with a buckled up front.

Made from a single panel of thick latex to hold the shape, it's fastened with eyelet straps over the shoulders and with a back buckle around the waist, seen here with our Pouch Shorts  in Red. Apron panel measures approx. 107cm. 
Also available in Calf Length and Short versions. 
The Playroom Apron measurements below are measured across the widest point where the apron eventually meet up at the back. Simply put, this is the "hip bone" measurement.
descriptions.short: Simple but uncompromising, this tough Playroom Apron looks good however hard you play.

descriptions.full:
A version of our Playroom Apron in Translucent latex, leaving as little as possible to the imagination. Go as bare as you dare, or perhaps slip on a pair of our Pouch Shorts underneath! Made from a single panel of thick latex to hold the shape, it's fastened with eyelet straps over the shoulders and with a back buckle around the waist. Apron panel measures approx. 95cm. 
Also available in Long and Short versions.
The Playroom Apron measurements below are measured across the widest point where the apron eventually meet up at the back. Simply put, this is the "hip bone" measurement.
descriptions.short: A version of our Playroom Apron in Translucent latex, leaving as little as possible to the imagination.

descriptions.full: A zippy version to add to Libidex's rubber apron collection! This Zip Apron features a full length front zip, with 4 zip sliders! This means you can open from the front, from the bottom, and even just from the middle, making it very versatile! The 2 sneaky side zips can open to expose your skin underneath. There are a wide range of coloured zips to choose from, please check the second trim option. Made in heavy 0.80mm rubber, Seen here in Black with Red Zip. Apron panel measures approx. 107cm.
descriptions.short: A zippy version to add to Libidex's rubber apron collection!

descriptions.full: Libidex's popular Tracksuit Trousers with our voluminous Combat pockets. The loose fitting trousers come with contrasting hems and pockets to hide your small belongings. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Translucent Black (main colour) and Black (trim colour). Please note, we recommend the Short Front Zip option as the Crotch zip may cause chaffing between the legs for this particular style as the crotch hang looser than a standard trousers/leggings.
descriptions.short: The loose fitting trousers come with contrasting hems and pockets to hide your small belongings.

descriptions.full:
A simple, loose-cut pair of Tracksuit Trousers for that sporty look either by themselves or in combination with our collection of Tops & Vests. This design features a wide appliqued double stripe in a contrasting colour down the outside leg seam - any colour combination is possible! The trousers feature elasticated waistband and ankles, and come without fly opening (zip available as optional extra). Shown here with our Y-Back Vest and Lightning Vest.
 Please note, we recommend the Short Front Zip option as the Crotch zip may cause chaffing between the legs for this particular style as the crotch hang looser than a standard trousers/leggings.
descriptions.short: A simple, loose-cut pair of Tracksuit Trousers for that sporty look either by themselves or in combination with our collection of Tops & Vests.

The trousers feature elasticated waistband and ankles,they also come without fly opening (zip available as optional extra). Shown here with our Brando Vest. Please note, we recommend the Short Front Zip option as the Crotch zip may cause chaffing between the legs for thisparticular style as the crotch hang looser than a standard trousers/leggings.

        IMPORTANT INFORMATIONBelow are some key points briefly explained. For full details you must go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.
Discreet PackagingYour discretion is one of our main priorities so please be assured, all our goods are sent in plain packaging, with just a staff member's name as the sender and our address.
Production Delivery, Dispatch Time & Rapid Order Service All our garments are hand-made, and production is now taking 2 to 4 weeks during this busy Sales period. If you need your goods urgently we offer a quick production service called 'Rapid Order' (This is a guaranteed 10 working day production and dispatch service which is charged at an extra 30% of the original price of the item- not the discounted price).PLEASE SEE CHECKOUT PAGE FOR AVAILABILITY OF THIS SERVICE. 
Delivery time is additional to production time and depends on your location. For Non-UK customers we recommend that you choose courier if you need a quicker delivery.
Returning GoodsBefore returning any items, please contact us and we'll guide you through the return process. You must contact us within 7 days after receiving your goods.
Latex Allergy - Natural Rubber Latex Allergy Latex Garments are produced from Natural Rubber Latex (NRL). NRL is an integral part of thousands of everyday consumer and healthcare items. The proteins contained within NRL can cause allergic reactions to Latex. More than 40,000 products used in homes, schools and medical settings contain latex, including common items such as: condoms, rubber bands, balloons, surgical and examination gloves, clothing elastic, etc. Latex allergy, or hypersensitivity, occurs when the body's immune system reacts to proteins found in NRL. Some individuals have specific antibodies, called IgE antibodies, that make them hypersensitive to the proteins in NRL. Although we take great care to use latex sheeting that has been 'leached' to a high level, to remove the proteins to a legally acceptable standard, the onus is on you the consumer to ensure that you do not have this problem prior to purchasing or wearing latex clothing. (Please note, that in over 25 years of our company selling latexwear we have never received any complaints of allergy caused by our clothing.)
These are only some key points briefly explained. For full details please go to our 'Orders, Deliveries and Returns' page. Click here for full details.    
    
        
    TracksuitTrousers

descriptions.full:
Slightly naughtier than normal, this loose-cut pair of Translucent Tracksuit Trousers are available only in see-through latex that leaves just enough to the imagination! Though of course you can also slip on one of our Jock-Straps or G-Strings underneath! The trousers feature a sewn elasticated waistband and ankles,they also come without fly opening (zip available as optional extra).Please be aware that the waistband and ankles will be in a Solid Colour and Not Translucent as to give a neater finishing touch PLEASE NOTE THAT THE TRIM COLOUR PERTAINS TO THE WAIST AND ANKLE BANDS.
 Please note, we recommend the Short Front Zip option as the Crotch zip may cause chaffing between the legs for thisparticular style as the crotch hang looser than a standard trousers/leggings.
descriptions.short: Slightly naughtier than normal, this loose-cut pair of Translucent Tracksuit Trousers are available only in see-through latex that leaves just enough to the imagination.

descriptions.full:
For that special evening out, these stylish Astaire Trousers are the perfect complement to our Dress Shirt and Bond Jacket (shown here) as well as other garments from our Suits-Jackets collection. They come with two side pockets and a working rear pocket (the latter with contrasting trim) and a contrasting stripe down the leg seam (shown here in Metallic Pewter, but other colours are available). The trousers feature a concealed fly zip and snap fasteners on the waistband.
Now available in all sizes and lengths.
Please note! How to measure your inside leg - With a tape measure starting at your crotch (as close as possible!) straight down to where you want your trousers to finish! This length may change depending on what type of shoes you are wearing.
descriptions.short: For that special evening out, these stylish Astaire Trousers are the perfect complement to our Dress Shirt and Bond Jacket (shown here) as well as other garments from our Suits & Jackets collection.

descriptions.full: Fulfil your motorbike fantasies with these classic Biker Zipper Trousers. They feature a traditional flap front let down by two zips on the upper legs and are finished with a broad waistband secured by four snap fasteners. Also available with rear zip (extra charge). Made from thick 0.80mm latex.Shown here with our Zipper Vest in Black,  Pouch Shorts in Red and Polo Shirt in Metallic Silver.
descriptions.short: Fulfil your motorbike fantasies with these classic Biker Zipper Trousers.

descriptions.full: A pair of supertight jeans with a twisted trim around the legs. The front includes two small pockets. Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (trim colour). Belt is not included.
descriptions.short: A pair of supertight jeans with a twisted trim around the legs

descriptions.full: An essential part of your military club kit, these stylish combat trousers feature two deep pockets on the lower legs and working hip and rear pockets too - so plenty of carrying capacity! They are closed with a concealed fly zip and snap fastener on the waistband, and can be worn with Combat Rubbers (''blousing rubbers'') to secure the trouser bottom around the ankles in true army style - included . Belt not included. Shown here with our Combat Waistcoat.
descriptions.short: An essential part of your military club kit, these stylish combat trousers feature two deep pockets on the lower legs and working hip and rear pockets too - so plenty of carrying capacity.

descriptions.full:
Simple, classic-cut Drainpipe Trousers. These are pull-on for simplicity and comfort and without pockets, bu it is also available with a front zipper or the through crotch zipper. An ideal addition to any wardrobe. Made from 0.50mm latex. Shown here with Chunky-Belt and Handy-Purse.
.
descriptions.short: Simple, classic-cut Drainpipe Trousers which pull-on for simplicity and comfort and without pockets, bu it is also available with a front zipper or the through crotch zipper.

descriptions.full:
A pair of 3/4 length trousers, complete with contrasting cuffs and adjustable braces. The trousers include both a front and back pocket, and have contrasting turn up cuffs. Inside leg seam is approximately 28-30 inch. 
Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour). Also in Red (main colour) and Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: A pair of 3/4 length trousers, complete with contrasting cuffs and adjustable braces.

descriptions.full:
All present and correct - a smart pair of Parade Trousers featuring a broad strip in contrasting colour down the leg seam. Fastened with a front zipper to the top of the waistband.Made from 0.50mm latex. Please note  the length means the inside leg measurment.
Seen here with our Long Sleeves Button Shirt, Plain tie and the Round Collar Zipper Top.
descriptions.short: All present and correct - a smart pair of Parade Trousers featuring a broad strip in contrasting colour down the leg seam.

descriptions.full: A zipped version of our Combat Trousers, these classic cut jeans feature 2 extra large pockets on the mid thighs and 2 zipped pockets on the back. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Pewter. Belt not included.
descriptions.short: A zipped version of our Combat Trousers.

descriptions.full: For those with the sea in their blood, these Sailor Trousers are just the thing for a night out. They feature a traditional sailor-style drop-down front (non-detachable) with snap-fasteners to reveal whatever there is beneath (our Zipper Briefs in this case!). The broad waistband is secured with four strong snap-fasteners. There are two working back pockets too . Made from thick, 0.80mm latex.Shown here with our Track Polo Shirt in White with Black trim.
descriptions.short: For those with the sea in their blood, these Sailor Trousers are just the thing for a night out.

descriptions.full:
Our Sinatra Trousers are of classic cut with traditional pockets and concealed zip fly, with a functioning pocket at the back. They go well with our more formal Jackets and Shirts, but can look equally good just by themselves. Seen here ( main picture) in Metallic Silver, White, Metallic Peacock, Black and Metallic Green. Made in thick, 0.80mm latex. Now available in all sizes and lengths!
Please note! How to measure your inside leg - With a tape measure starting at your crotch (as close as possible!) straight down to where you want your trousers to finish! This length may change depending on what type of shoes you are wearing.
descriptions.short: Our Sinatra Trousers are of classic cut with traditional pockets and concealed zip fly, with a functioning pocket at the back.

descriptions.full: A two tone elaborate take on combat trousers. The Supreme Combat Trousers feature a number of different pockets, fastened with zips, press studs or a simple flap. You are sure to hold all the gear you need! Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Peacock (second colour). Also in Olive Green (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (Second colour).
descriptions.short: The Supreme Combat Trousers feature a number of different pockets, fastened with zips, press studs or a simple flap.

descriptions.full: The long sleeve version of our Hospital Gown. This easy to wear gown is based on a traditional hospital gown, complete with the open back! The gown is tied up at the back with latex strings and is trimmed around the neck, cuffs and hem with a contrasting colour. We think it looks perfect in conventional hospital colours, but is available in all of our colour range. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Jade Green with White Trim.
descriptions.short: This easy to wear gown is based on a traditional hospital gown, complete with the open back!

descriptions.full: Become the patient in this Hospital Gown! This easy to wear gown is based on a traditional hospital gown, complete with the open back! The gown is tied up at the back with latex strings and is trimmed around the neck, cuffs and hem with a contrasting colour. We think it looks perfect in conventional hospital colours, but is available in all of our colour range. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Light Blue with White trim.
descriptions.short: Become the patient in this Hospital Gown!

descriptions.full:
A stylish hoodie with a cool design on the front and back. The Alchemy Hoodie features two roomy pockets on the front. We think it looks perfect in two bold colours. Seen here with our Narrow Leg Jean in Black. 
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Pearlsheen Silver (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Royal Blue (second colour), with our Crew Shirt  in Electric Blue and the Brando Vest in Pearlsheen Silver.
descriptions.short: A stylish hoodie with a cool design on the front and back. The Alchemy Hoodie features two roomy pockets on the front. We think it looks perfect in two bold colours

descriptions.full:
The Bullet Hoodie is a heavy rubber hoodie with a strong look. The hoodie features a number of press stud tabs that can be taken off and also arranged vertically. It also includes a full length zip, a hoodie zip, and two zipped pockets. Seen here with our Classic Jeans in Metallic Pewter. 
Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Black and in Metallic Red. Please note, zip is only available in black.
descriptions.short: The Bullet Hoodie is a heavy rubber hoodie with a strong look.

descriptions.full:
The Cyber Hoodie features an intricate pattern of curved trims all around the front, back and hood. We think its looks great with a brighter coloured trim but you can choose from any of the available colours for your own style.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Vibrant Orange (second colour, please note this is backed onto white to keep vibrant). And in Yellow (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (second colour) with our Classic Jeans  in Black and Metallic Pewter. Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes. This item DOES NOT qualify for our Rapid Service and will therefore not allow you to order any of the items in your basket as Rapid. If you wish the other items to be Rapid please order this item separately.
descriptions.short: The Cyber Hoodie features an intricate pattern of curved trims

descriptions.full:
A hoodie with a massive double digit number on the front. The number comes trimmed with a contrasting colour too. The hoodie includes two roomy front pockets. Choose any double digit number you require.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with white (second colour) and Red (trim). And in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour) and Yellow (trim) with our Classic Jeans in Black. Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: A hoodie with a massive double digit number on the front.

descriptions.full:
A two tone hoodie with any choice of a double digit number just for you! Our numbers are laser cut for a neat and precise finish and placed on a panel of a contrasting colour to stand out. The front also includes two handy hidden pockets.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) and Metallic Blue (second colour). Also in Metallic Green (main colour) and Sand (second colour) with our Classic Jeans  in Black. Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: A two tone hoodie with any choice of a double digit number just for you!

descriptions.full:
A Hoodie with a number of patches on the shoulders and elbows. The front features a rather phallic design.. or maybe that's just us!
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Purple (second colour) Narrow Leg Jeans in Black. And in Black (main colour) with Vibrant Orange (Second colour) with our Combat Trousers Please note, zips come Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zips to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: A Hoodie with a number of patches on the shoulders and elbows.

descriptions.full:
A stylish hoodie that can be customised with your choice of numbers! Personalise this two tone hoodie with a double digit. The Mini digit hoodie has a horizontal contrast between two colours.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Metallic Red (main colour) with Black (second colour). Also in White (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour), with our Brando Vest Top  in Pearlsheen Silver and Classic Jeans in Black. Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: A stylish hoodie that can be customised with your choice of numbers

descriptions.full:
A fantastic colourful hoodie with a symmetrical swerve on the front. The Morpheus Hoodie features two bold colourful panels on the front and into the hood.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour) and White (third colour). And in Metallic Green (main Colour), with Electric Leaf (second colour) and Metallic Platinum (third colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Semi trans vibrant orange (second colour) and semi trans Vibrant Green (third colour), with our Brando Vest in Pearlsheen Silver and Narrow Leg Jeans in Metallic Pewter. Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: A fantastic colourful hoodie with a symmetrical swerve on the front.

descriptions.full:
An easy to wear hoodie with contrasting trims. This hoodie features a hood with a centre zip that can be opened to flatten the hood when down. The hoodie includes two deep pockets on the front.
Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) and Yellow (second colour). Also in Royal Blue (main colour) and Pearlsheen Silver (second colour), with our Crew Shirt  in Orange and Eletric Blue and Classic Jeans in Black.   Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
descriptions.short: This hoodie features a hood with a centre zip that can be opened to flatten the hood when down.

descriptions.full:
A tight fitting hoodie with a flash of colour! The hood itself is layered with a second colour for a pop. The hoodie is based on our popular zipper top for a slim fit look but also slightly extended.
Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) and Red (second colour). Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A long sleeve zipper shirt with contrasting stripes!

descriptions.full: A cool and casual design that goes well with the matching Tracksuit Trousers or with any of our collection of Trousers, Jeans & Chaps for a street-wise look. Our Stripe Hoodie is finished with a sporty double stripe down the outside arms seams in a contrasting colour (any colour combination is possible) With elasticated waistband and cuffs and full pull-up hood with drawstring. It's a true latex take on one of today's most popular designs. Seen here with our Classic jeans.
descriptions.short: A cool and casual design that goes well with the matching Tracksuit Trousers or with any of our collection of Trousers, Jeans & Chaps for a street-wise look.

descriptions.full:
An updated classic. This Zip Hoodie features contrasting coloured zips. This stylish hoodie includes 4 small pockets, perfect for storing small items without the need for a bag. The main zip runs full length on the front and there is a separate zip that can close the hood fully.
Zips are only available in a limited amount of colours. Please note, the zip colours are described to match our latex colour chart, "metallic" zip does not mean the zip is metallic, it only means it matches our metallic rubber. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (zip colour). Also in Royal Blue (main colour) with Black (zip colour), with our Combat Trousers in Metallic Pewter. 
Standard length is approx. 54-56cm from collar bone to hem. Inside arm is approx. 49-52cm. Model is wearing a medium.
descriptions.short: An updated classic. This Zip Hoodie features contrasting coloured zips.

descriptions.full:
A short sleeve zipper top with a drawstring hoodie. The skin tight top features contrasting strip on the hem and sleeves.
Available in Petite, Regualr and Tall. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Blue (second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Yellow (second colour). Please note, zip comes Black as standard, however we do have coloured zips available. If you would like your zip to match (or close match), please add this into your notes.
Length measurement from collar bone to hem. Please check our general size chart for other measurements.
descriptions.short: A short sleeve zipper top with a drawstring hoodie.

Finished with a contrasting trim of your choice (see above menu), this is a killer mini dress, perfect for that night out at your favourite party.Comes with back zipper fastening as standard. descriptions.short: As the name suggests, this is truly the dress to make you feel like a woman among the Gods.

descriptions.full: This dress recalls the elegance of the classic Chinese style with its capped sleeves and 3 buckles down the front.  The Dress is fastened at the back with a 3/4 length zip. Seen here in Metallic Petrol Blue with Metallic Red trim.
descriptions.short: This dress recalls the elegance of the classic Chinese style with its capped sleeves and 3 buckles down the front.  The Dress is fastened at the back with a 3/4 length zip. Seen here in Metallic Black with Metallic Red trim.

descriptions.full:
A multi trimmed dress with definitive out of this world style! The Negatron Dress features slim contrasting trims decorating the whole dress from front to back.
Only available in Regular Length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Semi Trans Vibrant Green (trim). Please note semi trans colours are doubled onto white for a brighter finish. Also available with long sleeves.
descriptions.short: A multi trimmed dress with definitive out of this world style!

descriptions.full: The Riot Dress oozes sexy dominance. The two tone dress features silver metal press studs, buttoning down the contrasting panels across the chest and hem. It also includes d-rings on the cuffs and 2 small handy pockets. Only available in regular length. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Metallic Pewter (Second colour).
descriptions.short: The Riot Dress oozes sexy dominance. The two tone dress features silver metal press studs, buttoning down the contrasting panels across the chest and hem.

descriptions.full: Channel your inner Gaga and hide from the paparazzi behind this oversized hood. This dress features smaller puff sleeves and a full-length front zip.
descriptions.short: Channel your inner Gaga and hide from the paparazzi behind this oversized hood. This dress features smaller puff sleeves and a full-length front zip.

descriptions.full: This cheeky Eastern design has two side splits to reveal a sliver of thigh. The dress includes a traditional Chinese neckline and cap sleeves. It comes with a half back zip. Seen here in Black with Red trim.
descriptions.short: This cheeky Eastern design has two side splits to reveal a sliver of thigh.

descriptions.full: A sexy air hostess dress re-imagined in latex. The Toxic Dress features a plunging neck opening and a flouncy back hem for a flirty kick. Only available in Regular Length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Light Blue (main colour) with Pearlsheen Silver (trim). Worn with our Stewardess Cap (not included).
descriptions.short: A sexy air hostess dress re-imagined in latex

descriptions.full: The anticpated Union Jack dress is here for your patriotic style! Or is it to satisfy your secret spice girls crush?! We love it either way! The Union Jack Dress can be re-imagined in your own colourway if you fancy updating the flag yourself! Only available in regular length. Seen here in Royal Blue (main colour) with Red (second colour) and White (trim).
descriptions.short: The anticpated Union Jack dress is here for your patriotic style! Or is it to satisfy your secret spice girls crush?!

descriptions.full: Bring back the 1960s with this psychedelic pencil dress! Available without sleeves and fastens with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in main colour Black with second colour Jade Green.
descriptions.short: Bring back the 1960s with this psychedelic pencil dress!

descriptions.full: A shorter version of our Grecian style Irish Gown. This figure hugging dress features a striking neck detail with buttons at the back, connecting to a shapely sweetheart neckline at the front. This dress is available with or with zip. Seen here in Black.
descriptions.short: This figure hugging dress features a striking neck detail with buttons at the back.

descriptions.full: Smart but still sexy, this dress comes without sleeves so it's extremely comfortable to wear, and the peplum around the waist gives you that perfect hourglass shape. Comes with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in Black with Metallic Pewter (second colour).
descriptions.short: Smart but still sexy, this dress comes without sleeves so it's extremely comfortable to wear.

descriptions.full: Bringing back the peplum, but with a sexy twist. The peplum adds plenty of shape and flair to your look, while the body fits sleekly and flaunts your hourglass curves. Finished with a heart shape keyhole and 3/4 back zip.  Just add a pair of stiletto heels and our Filigree gloves and you're ready to go! Seen here in Black with Metallic Pewter (second colour).
descriptions.short: Bringing back the peplum, but with a sexy twist.

descriptions.full: Simple but chic, our Angelina Dress is the archetypal "little black dress", and flatters the figure with real style. A delightful design that reveals the shoulders and creates an hourglass effect on the figure. It is fastened with a three-quarter length back zip as standard.
descriptions.short: Simple but chic, our Angelina Dress is the archetypal 'little black dress', and flatters the figure with real style.

descriptions.full: This chic vintage-style dress comes with attractive bows on the shoulders and matching waistband detail to enhance the feminine form. Fastens at the back with a 3/4 zip. Seen here in Black with Electric Rose trim, and in Jade Green with White trim.
descriptions.short: This chic vintage-style dress comes with attractive bows on the shoulders.

descriptions.full: With it's horseshoe-shaped 'keyhole', and closely tailored shaping, you're bound to be lucky with this little number, with its revealing backless design. It features a halter neck with a collar band fastened with two rear press-studs, and is closed with a half-length back zip.
descriptions.short: With it"s horseshoe-shaped "keyhole", and closely tailored shaping, you"re bound to be lucky with this little number, with its revealing backless design.

descriptions.full: Make a bold entrance in this striking dress! With it's psychedelic pop art vibe, this is one of the most discerning styles in our Dandy Girl collection. Fastens at the back with a short zip. Seen here in Black with White (second colour).
descriptions.short: Make a bold entrance in this striking dress!

descriptions.full: With a discreet and unusual 'keyhole' opening finished with naughty clasp in the centre, our Pussy Galore Dress is both elegant and racy. Tailored and seamed to give a tightly shaped fit, it is finished with a short zip at the back.
descriptions.short: With a discreet and unusual "keyhole" opening finished with naughty clasp in the centre, our Pussy Galore Dress is both elegant and racy.

descriptions.full: A sleeveless version of our Princess Dress, this dress compliments every body shape. This simple but elegant dress nips your waist in and enhances an hourglass figure for a charming feminine look. Now comes in 3 lengths to suit all heights!
descriptions.short: A sleeveless version of our Princess Dress, this dress compliments every body shape.

descriptions.full: Dare to walk down the aisle in this vintage-inspired dress. The neckline and sleeves are finished off with our delicate filigree lace trim. Worn with our Filigree Gloves, Curve-line Corset and fabric petticoat (not included). Seen here in White with White Lace trim.
descriptions.short: Dare to walk down the aisle in this vintage-inspired dress.

descriptions.full:
To add to our growing collection of boobs out dresses, this dress has a playful flouncy hemline as well as an exposed front. It has a simple princess collar and periodic gigot sleeves. Available with a back zip only. Seen here in Black.
Please note: nipple pasties not included.
descriptions.short: To add to our growing collection of boobs out dresses, this dress has a playful flouncy hemline as well as an exposed front.

descriptions.full: A timeless Libidex dress. The V-neck Corset Dress features an integrated corset waist to accentuate your figure, and a deep V-neck to enhance your cleavage even more! This dress looks perfect on everyone! Comes with a choice of full front or back zip. Also available with short sleeves. Made in 0.40mm latex, with a 0.80mm corset. Seen here in Translucent Black (main colour) with Black (second colour), in Translucent Pink with Black, and in Bronze (main colour) with Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: A timeless Libidex dress.With a deep V-neck to enhance your cleavage even more!

descriptions.full: A classic twist on our attention-grabbing military dress. This dress features a button-down front and eye-catching star details on the lapels, epaulettes and cuffs. The sleeves are pleated at the shoulder and the cuffs are made in thicker 0.80 latex. Seen here in Olive Green with Red trim and in Black with Metallic Silver trim.
descriptions.short: A classic twist on our attention-grabbing military dress.

descriptions.full: A long-sleeved version of our popular Diamond Dress this sleek and form-fitting one-piece provides a delightful little oriental edge, especially with the trim outlining the centre. As versatile in black as it is in white, or any other colour for that matter - why not pick your own delightful combination? Comes with a half length back zip.
descriptions.short: A long-sleeved version of our popular Diamond Dress this sleek and form-fitting one-piece provides a delightful little oriental edge, especially with the trim outlining the centre.

descriptions.full: A uniform style dress with a nod to the Fhloston Paradise Air Hostess. The Fhloston Dress features double layer trims and a translucent panel on the underbust (translucent flesh). It include cups in a size of your choice and a back zip, the dress is finished of with a shirt collar. Also available with short sleeves. Only available in Regular length. Made in 0.40mm latex with thicker cups. Seen here in Mid Blue (main colour) with White (second colour). Our cup sizes may not relate to your standard bra size. Please refer to our Bra Size Chart to pick the correct cup size. If you are between sizes, we recommend picking the smaller size.
descriptions.short: A uniform style dress with a nod to the Fhloston Paradise Air Hostess.

descriptions.full:
62cm / 24.5" approx. length from front base of neck to hem.
This exquisite oriental dress is styled around what a modern fetish Geisha might wear, with a stylish trim that creates a figure hugging wrap around effect. The dress comes with three quarter length sleeves, and even a subtle reference to Geisha tradition with a revealing angled wrist design. The cunning use of applique creates a beautiful effect, ensuring the wearer a trail of breathless suitors in their wake!
descriptions.short: This exquisite oriental dress is styled around what a modern fetish Geisha might wear, with a stylish trim that creates a figure hugging wrap around effect.

descriptions.full: Flaunt your cleavage in this Victorian style V-neck dress. Features exaggerated sleeves in thinner 0.25 latex with buttoned cuffs. Seen here in Black with Translucent Smoky Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: Flaunt your cleavage in this Victorian style V-neck dress.

descriptions.full: 84cm / 33" approx. length from mid shoulder to hem. Get them standing to attention with this simple but effective military style dress. Styled with shoulder epaulettes, decorative silver buttoned breast pockets, and trimmed sleeves. It's fastened with a full-length, open-ended front zip. Military Hat not included.
descriptions.short: Get them standing to attention with this simple but effective military style dress, it's styled with shoulder epaulettes, decorative silver buttoned breast pockets, and trimmed sleeves.

descriptions.full: Our new Patrol collection has been so popular, we added a dress! Similar to our much loved military dress, but with contrasting lapels and cuffs. The Patrol Dress is the perfect uniform update. Only available in Regular length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (Second colour). Also in Olive (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also available with short sleeve.
descriptions.short: Our new Patrol collection has been so popular, we added a dress!

descriptions.full:
Sexy and sporty, this Playgirl Dress comes with laser cut numbers of your choice on the front and optional lettering on the back in a contrasting colour. The hem and cuffs are trimmed with a wide secondary colour. Features a V-neck and front zip only. Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. Also available in short sleeve. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Supatex Purple (main colour) with White (second colour) and Bronze (trim).
Dress can be customised with text on the back as pictured.*
descriptions.short: Sexy and sporty, this Playgirl Dress comes with laser cut numbers of your choice on the front and optional lettering on the back in a contrasting colour.

descriptions.full:
Taking our Diamond dress to longer lengths, it creates the perfect evening dress combined with our Nicole Split Skirt. Showing as much thigh to be just enough, it's both elegant, edgy, but most of all - downright sexy! Dressing up for a special occasion out on the town, be it Evening Ball or Electric Ballroom? Or even for a special evening in? The Diamond split dress provides just that elegance and excitement you need. Seen here in Black with Metallic Red trim.
Length = 135cm, Measured from centre of collar bone to hem
descriptions.short: Taking our Diamond dress to longer lengths, it creates the perfect evening dress combined with our Nicole Split Skirt.

descriptions.full:
To round out our 'Diamond' collection of dresses, we've paired up our favourite top with our redesigned hobble skirt, creating another classic dress. With the hobble dress coming with a long zip up the back of the skirt, the dress is more versatile than you think, and can be worn opened up to show as much leg as you'd dare, or closed to the bottom for a deliciously restrictive effect.
Length = 135cm, Measured from centre of collar bone to hem
descriptions.short: To round out our 'Diamond' collection of dresses, we've paired up our favourite top with our redesigned hobble skirt, creating another classic dress.

descriptions.full: Be the goth Belle of the ball in this dramatic creation. The neckline and sleeves are finished off with our delicate filigree lace trim. Worn with our Filigree Gloves, Curve-line Corset and fabric petticoat (not included). Seen here in Black and Translucent Smoky Black (second colour) with Black lace trim.
descriptions.short: Be the goth Belle of the ball in this dramatic creation.

descriptions.full:
An alternative take on our classic nurse dress, this saucy little number features applique detailing on the sleeves with a black medical cross motif, as well as contrast detailing on the collar. Unlike the classic nurse dress, this is a skin tight and fitted mini dress which accentuates your curves to the max! Ohhhhh Matron! Comes with a short back zip.Shown here in White with Black trim, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the above menu.
Please note that the Nurse Hat comes separately.
descriptions.short: An alternative take on our classic nurse dress, this saucy little number features applique detailing on the sleeves and hem, with a black medical cross motif.

descriptions.full: A vintage inspired military dress! This dress has a number of features that include epaulettes and mini lapels to give a retro military feel. A racy back split gives the dress a cheeky kick. The dress's smart button stand is just for style and is actually available with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in Olive Green with Metallic Old Gold trim.
descriptions.short: A vintage inspired military dress!

descriptions.full: The nurse will see you now! A shirt style dress with a pair of decorated lapels and a plunging neckline. This dress features flattering elbow length sleeves and a contrasting waistband. Looks fabulous in classic medical colours. Available with 3/4 length zip. Seen here in Jade Green and White trim.
descriptions.short: The nurse will see you now! A shirt style dress with a pair of decorated lapels and a plunging neckline.

descriptions.full: A short sleeve version of our patrol dress. Slip this uniform dress on for an instant officer look, and team with a matching belt like we have! Only available in regular length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (Second colour). Also in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour).
descriptions.short: Slip this uniform dress on for an instant officer look, and team with a matching belt like we have!

descriptions.full: A simple close fitting dress with half sleeves, this creation has a fun capelet attached to the neckline and is made in thinner 0.25 latex. Fastens with 3/4 back zip. Seen here in Black with Translucent Smoky Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: A simple close fitting dress with half sleeves and a little capelet.

descriptions.full: Hola seorita! This Flamenco-inspired dress features short cape sleeves and well fitted cups with contrasting trim around the neck. The dress is finished with ruffled back and mermaid style hem. Comes with a short back zip. Seen here in Black with White trim.
descriptions.short: Hola seorita! This Flamenco-inspired dress features short cape sleeves and well fitted cups.

descriptions.full: This traffic-stopping, retro-style pencil dress, complete with mock bolero, gives you the perfect hourglass look. A pencil style skirt and bottom peplum adds a touch of 1940s flare. The dress fastens with a 3/4 back zip and has decorative trim around the edges. Seen here in Black with Baby Pink trim, and in Metallic Blue with Metallic Silver trim.
descriptions.short: A traffic-stopping, retro-style pencil dress, complete with mock bolero.

descriptions.full: This is a cute little V-neck dress with flared skirt and short sleeves. Also available with long sleeves (please choose from the garment options). Available with or without trim. Seen here in Black with Metallic Blue trim. Bow collar NOT included.
descriptions.short: This is a cute little V-neck dress with flared skirt and short sleeves.

descriptions.full: Fun and cheerful swing dress, a classic take on American sports for a fun and sexy costume. The v-neck and waistband flatter the body figure. The numbers are laser cut for precision for a fully customised dress. Made in 0.40mm latex. Only available in regular length. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (second colour), and White (main colour) with Red (second colour). Also in Baby Pink (main colour) with Black (second colour).
descriptions.short: Fun and cheerful swing dress, a classic take on American sports for a fun and sexy costume.

descriptions.full: Suit up in this double breasted button up dress! This fabulous swing dress features a shawl collar with matching cuffs. It has 3 pairs of workable buttons down the front. Seen here in Black with Red trim.
descriptions.short: Suit up in this double breasted button up dress!

descriptions.full:
A sassy take on the classic Red riding hood dress.
This would make a fabulous choice for a costume ball or 
dress up party. Simple and seductive puff sleeve dress with a large hood. The flared hem is made to flatter the figure! Available with a short or full length front zip. 
Shown here in Red.
descriptions.short: Simple and seductive puff sleeve dress with a large hood.

descriptions.full: This simple but cute dress with mock bolero attached, contrasting waistband and a full circle skirt, evokes memories of the retro style. Comes with a 3/4 back zip. Shown here worn with our Filigree Gloves. Seen here in Black with Baby Pink trim, and in Bubblegum Pink with Baby Pink trim.
descriptions.short: This simple but cute dress with mock bolero attached, contrasting waistband and a full circle skirt.

descriptions.full:
Sleek, flattering and well shaped, the Commandate Corset Dress brings everyone to attention. Combining a strong corseted waist in 0.80mm latex with thick wired bra cups and a tight pencil bottom. It comes complete with military-style epaulettes. This dress is made in 0.50mm latex and the corset panels are boned and made in 0.80mm. Seen here in Olive with Sand trim.Military Hat is NOT INCLUDED but can be bought separately, click here.

descriptions.full:
A classic take on the Tequila Cheerleader Dress, and particularly flattering on the fuller figure (but looks good on anyone!) this superb creation combines a well-made, strongly-boned corset waist with thick (0.80mm) and wired bra-cups for full support. The dress is made in 0.50mm latex and is finished with a playful full-circle flared skirt. Cups, sleeves and neckline can be finished in contrasting trim, and the dress fastens with a three-quarter length back zip. The corset panels can also be made in contrasting colour - please ask!

descriptions.short: A classic take on the Tequila Cheerleader Dress, and particularly flattering on the fuller figure.

descriptions.full:
Sleek, flattering and well shaped, the Veronica corset dress is every womans dream. Combining a strong corseted waist in 0.80mm latex with thick wired bra cups and a tight pencil bottom. This dress is made in 0.50mm latex and the corset panels are boned and made in 0.80mm . Also available in a Long sleeve version.
