descriptions.full: With a wide neckline, this dress features a peplum waist layer and is finished off with a decorative buckle. Comes with short cap-sleeves and contrasting trim around the neck and sleeves to match the skirt. Comes with a 3/4 back zip. Seen here in Black with Metallic Red (second colour) and in Metallic Black with Plum (second colour).
descriptions.short: With a wide neckline, this dress features a peplum waist layer and is finished off with a decorative buckle.

descriptions.full:
This tight fitting dress features a deep V-neck and short sleeves creating comfortable look that's easy to wear and ever so flattering. Available with front or back zip or with no zip at all. Seen here in Red.
Different sleeve lengths are available in the optional extras.
descriptions.short: This tight fitting dress features a deep V-neck.

descriptions.full:
This cute dress presents our new trimmed cape sleeve and features delicate weaving around the neckline. 
Available with or without a back zip. Seen here in Black with Red trim and in Bubblegum Pink with Metallic Black trim.
descriptions.short: This cute dress presents our new trimmed cape sleeve and features delicate weaving around the neckline.

descriptions.full: The Anatomic Dress is a tight fitting number adorned in shapely contrasting trims. Only available in Regular length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Comes with a Back Zip only. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Vibrant Bright Pink (trim colour).
descriptions.short: The Anatomic Dress is a tight fitting number adorned in shapely contrasting trims

descriptions.full: Be the Queen of the Galaxy in the Barbarella inspired dress. This super short dress features daring cut-outs, a shapely neckline and cap sleeves. Available with or without a zip. Seen here in Electric Rose and Metallic Silver trim.
descriptions.short: Be the Queen of the Galaxy in the Barbarella inspired dress.

descriptions.full:
Inspired by one of our favourite tops of our classic collection. The oriental inspired Diamond Top was just asking to be combined with a pencil skirt, so who were we to argue! As a sleek and form fitting one-piece, the Dress provides a delightful little oriental edge, especially with the trim outlining the centre. As versatile in black as it is in white, or any other colour for that matter - why not pick your own delightful combination? Comes with a half length back zip.
Seen here in Black with Metallic Red trim.
descriptions.short: Inspired by one of our favourite tops of our classic collection, the oriental inspired Diamond Top was just asking to be combined with a pencil skirt, so who were we to argue.

descriptions.full: Easy to wear and perfect for a great costume, this dress comes with big laser cut digit numbers of your choice and contrast trims on sides, neckline and sleeves. Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Red (main colour) with White (second colour). And in Black (main colour) with White (second colour). Also in White (main colour) with Mid Blue (second colour).
descriptions.short: Easy to wear and perfect for a great costume, this dress comes with big laser cut digit numbers of your choice.

descriptions.full: This simple puff sleeved skater dress has a flattering scoop neckline and a full circle skirt. Available with or without zip. Seen here in Black with Metallic Red trim.
descriptions.short: This simple puff sleeved skater dress has a flattering scoop neckline and a full circle skirt.

descriptions.full: This simple but sexy, figure-hugging pencil dress has a flattering scoop neckline and cute little puff sleeves, and is finished with a contrasting trim around the neckline and cuffs. Available with or without zip. Seen here in Black with Yellow trim, and in Black with Plum trim.
descriptions.short: This simple but sexy, figure-hugging pencil dress has a flattering scoop neckline and cute little puff sleeves.

descriptions.full: Zip yourself into this distinctive dress. Its continuous zip runs all the way around the dress and the sleeves. Seen here in Black with White zip.
descriptions.short: Zip yourself into this distinctive dress.

descriptions.full: An impressive addition to our extremely popular Heidi collection. Our Heidi Dress features a voluminous pleated top and sleeves contrasted by a tight fitted body. Choose your trim colour for matching collar and cuffs. Available with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink trim.
descriptions.short: An impressive addition to our extremely popular Heidi collection.

descriptions.full: Cute little dress with puff sleeves and a full circle skirt. The contrasting waistband provides a flattering fit for all body types and it's finished with a bow a the front. Also available without bows - please ask! Seen here in Black with Red trim, and Metallic Fuchsia with Metallic Blue trim.
descriptions.short: Cute little dress with puff sleeves and a full circle skirt.

descriptions.full: Who can save the universe?! A nod to 60's sci-fi, this dress has contrasting side panels and trimmed cap sleeves. This dress is finished off with an asymmetric hemline. Choose up to your favourite 3 colours. This dress is available with or without a zip. Seen here in main colour Metallic Purple, second colour Translucent Pink, and trim colour Black.
descriptions.short: Who can save the universe?! A nod to 60's sci-fi, this dress has contrasting side panels and trimmed cap sleeves.

descriptions.full: Parade about in this charming dress. The subtle scallop detail edges gives an enchanting look to a classic princess cut design. Available with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in Metallic Green.
descriptions.short: Parade about in this charming dress.

descriptions.full: A simple, short sleeve princess dress with a medical insignia. Looks great in traditional hospital colours like white or jade green. Available with a variety of zips. Seen here in Red with full length front zip. Second colour in White. Please note the second colour refers to the Cross Insignia, which is a circle with a cut out cross, so the cross will always be the same as the main colour and the circle will be the second colour.
descriptions.short: A simple, short sleeve princess dress with a medical insignia.

descriptions.full: An edgier version of our Shi Shi Dress but with a narrower contrasting trim and matching colour faux buttons. Fastens at the back with 3/4 length zip. Seen here in Black with Red trim but any colour combination is possible!
descriptions.short: An edgier version of our Shi Shi Dress but with a narrower contrasting trim.

descriptions.full:
The Playgirl Dress is a flattering V-neck dress with customisable options to make it special for you! The numbers on the front and optional lettering on the back are laser cut for precision. The hem and cuffs are trimmed with a wide secondary colour. Includes a front zip. Available in Petite, Regular and Tall. Also available in long sleeve. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour) and Red (trim). Also in Red (main colour) with White (second colour) with Black (trim).
Dress can be customised with text on the back as pictured.*
descriptions.short: The Playgirl Dress is a flattering V-neck dress with customisable options to make it special for you!

descriptions.full: The Ramona Dress is a simple but sexy pencil-style dress with short sleeves and a cute bow in contrasting colour to match the trim. Available with or without zip. Seen here in Black with Red trim.
descriptions.short: The Ramona Dress is a simple but sexy pencil-style dress with short sleeves.

descriptions.full: For the sporty girl that cheers at every goal, this Varsity Dress dress contours the body and comes with press studs all down the front. It features contrasting bands on the neck and short sleeves. Available in Regular, Tall and Petite. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour) and Red (trim). Light Blue (main colour) with White (second colour) and Black (trim), and in Black (main colour) with White (second colour) and Yellow (trim) Dress can be customised with text on the back as pictured.This item DOES NOT qualify for our Rapid Service and will therefore not allow you to order any of the items in your basket as Rapid. If you wish the other items to be Rapid please order this item separately.
descriptions.short: For the sporty girl that cheers at every goal, this Varsity Dress dress contours the body and comes with press studs all down the front.

descriptions.full: This sexy figure hugging dress fits like a glove! The cups, neckline and short cap sleeves are finished with contrasting trim. Comes with a 3/4 length back zip. Seen here in Black with Red trim.
descriptions.short: This sexy figure hugging dress fits like a glove!

descriptions.full: Play peekaboo in this daring dress! Pick translucent colours to reveal what's underneath as long as you have nothing to hide! This dress has capped sleeves and a flattering scoop neckline. Seen here in Black with Translucent Pink second colour.
descriptions.short: Play peekaboo in this daring dress!

descriptions.full: Salsa across the dancefloor in our Latin inspired dress! The voluminous asymmetric frilly neckline compliments the frilly thigh high leg split. This dress comes with a short back zip. Seen here in Black with Royal Blue trim.
descriptions.short: Salsa across the dancefloor in our Latin inspired dress!

descriptions.full:
A fusion between our favoured Cherry Pie Dress and our versatile Hobble Skirt. The dress features a full length back zip that can either be left open to reveal your legs or closed fully for restrictive fun. Seen here in Black with White trim.
The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: A fusion between our favoured Cherry Pie Dress and our versatile Hobble Skirt.

descriptions.full: A sexy and stunning design cut asymmetrically to reveal the full leg, for those who dare! Shown here in White, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the menu.
descriptions.short: A sexy and stunning design cut asymmetrically to reveal the full leg, for those who dare.

descriptions.full: Loose-fitting sleeveless Ranch shirt, which lets you stay cool while looking hot. A perfect match for our tight fitting lace-side trousers. Shown here in  white, but different colours are also available.
descriptions.short: Loose-fitting sleeveless Ranch shirt, which lets you stay cool while looking hot.

descriptions.full: A seductive pull-on number with a plunging v-neckline finished with a bow, and wide arm openings, our Cami Vest makes a good match for our Cami Boxy and many other items from our lingerie ranges. Made from thin 0.25mm latex.Seen here in Black with Metallic Fuchsia trim, Metallic Fuchsia with Black trim and in Metallic Purple with Black trim.
descriptions.short: A seductive pull-on number with a plunging v-neckline finished with a bow, and wide arm openings, our Cami Vest makes a good match for our Cami Boxy and many other items from our lingerie ranges.

descriptions.full: A loose cut playsuit for a comfortable fit. The Rogue Playsuit has a combat style look and features a gathered waistband with a drawstring pull. It is made in a thinner latex for a more relaxed fit.The pockets and yoke are decorated with trims to complete the look. Only available in regular length. Made in 0.25mm latex. Seen here in Olive Green (main colour) with Black (second colour)
descriptions.short: A loose cut playsuit for a comfortable fit. The Rogue Playsuit has a combat style look and features a gathered waistband with a drawstring pull.

descriptions.full: Similar to our Rosetta Capri suit and Capri catsuit, the Lily Halter Suit is cut longer in the leg and features a halter neck fastened with three adjustable press studs. It comes with a Back through-crotch zip as standard (other zip options available), and comes in trimmed or plain versions
descriptions.short: Similar to our Rosetta Capri suit and Capri catsuit, the Lily Halter Suit is cut longer in the leg and features a halter neck fastened with three adjustable press studs.

descriptions.full: Cool to wear and great to be seen in, this Capri Suit has a halter-style neck which is fastened at the back with three adjustable press studs.  It's trimmed with bows and edging in contrasting colour. Seen here in Black with red trim.
descriptions.short: Cool to wear and great to be seen in, this Capri Suit has a halter-style neck which is fastened at the back with three adjustable press studs.

descriptions.full: The full works - a pair of classic jeans with all the features - four pockets, belt loops, zipped fly and rivets as standard. Also available without rivets, just specify when ordering. A good, snug, well-tailored fit and fashioned in thick rubber to give that strong, sturdy look.Worn with our Manette Bra (no trim).
descriptions.short: The full works - a pair of classic jeans with all the features - four pockets, belt loops, zipped fly and rivets as standard.

descriptions.full: With all the flavour of the Wild West, our range styled hipster jeans feature a streamlined fit with belt loops, functional back pockets and short zipped front. Tough but stylish. Shown with Chunky Belt, which can be ordered separately. Goes well with a variety of Tops & Vests, such as our Lindsey Crop Top. Please note belt is not included. Made in 0.5mm latex with waistband in 0.8mm.
descriptions.short: With all the flavour of the Wild West, our range styled hipster jeans feature a streamlined fit with belt loops, functional back pockets and short zipped front.

descriptions.full:
A pair of Capri trousers with a jean cut, these come with a front-zipped fl and working front pockets.  Made in 0.40mm latex. Other zip styles also available.
Seen here with our Brooklyn Jacket, and Alice Bra Top.
descriptions.short: A pair of Capri trousers with a jean cut, these come with a front-zipped fl and working front pockets.

descriptions.full:
A classic combination of a corset with a pencil-length skirt, this highly flattering number is one of our favourites in our range, creating a delightful contrast between the sleek skirt and the corseted waist. The corset is made in thick 0.80mm, figure-squeezing rubber with a boned front panel, and is fastened with a zip at the back.If wishing to vary colours, please note that the 'Main colour' applies to the skirt portion, while the 'second colour' applies to the whole corset. Why not try it in black, with a metallic red corset? If choosing the same colour for Skirt and Corset please be aware that as these two parts are made out of different thicknesses colours may vary. 
The measurements below refer to the waist size the garment is made for, not garment dimensions.
XS = 60cm - 63cmS = 64cm - 67cmM = 68cm - 71cmL = 72cm - 75cmXL = 76cm - 80cmXXL = 81cm - 85cm3XL = 86cm - 90cm4XL = 91cm - 95cm
descriptions.short: A classic combination of a corset with pencil-length skirt, a highly flattering number is one of our favourites in our range, creating a delightful contrast between the sleek skirt and corseted waist.

descriptions.full:
The Majorette Skirt combines a tight fitting corset with a flared skirt. The front and back features a lace up design and also includes integrated brace. Corset made in 0.80 with 0.50mm skirt. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (lace).
The measurements below refer to the waist size the garment is made for, not garment dimensions.
XS = 60cm - 63cmS = 64cm - 67cmM = 68cm - 71cmL = 72cm - 75cmXL = 76cm - 80cmXXL = 81cm - 85cm3XL = 86cm - 90cm4XL = 91cm - 95cm
descriptions.short: The Majorette Skirt combines a tight fitting corset with a flared skirt.

descriptions.full:
A neat combination of a dress and suspender skirt, the Dominique is made from thicker 0.80mm rubber, and has four suspender straps with clips. It fits tightly round the body and is fastened with a full-length, open zip at the back. Shown here worn over our Cecile G-String, Stockings and Naomi Shrug. Please note: Plain Black nipple pasties are not included with the skirt.
As this item is made from thick 0.80mm latex, it will not stretch as much as our other items made from thinner latex. When selecting your size, we recommend you refer to our size guide below to help you choose the right fit.
descriptions.short: A neat combination of a dress and suspender skirt, the Dominique is made from thicker rubber, and has four suspender straps with clips.

descriptions.full: This 1950's classic is just the perfect style to revisit the era of dreamboats and petticoats. Made in 0.40mm latex making it lighter to wear. Available with or without a short back zip. The length of the skirt is approximately 90 cm. Seeing here with our Under-wire basque (NOT included). Please note the petticoat is NOT included.
descriptions.short: This 1950's  classic full circle skirt is just the perfect  style to revisit  the era of dreamboats and petticoats.

descriptions.full: Full length and thoroughly restricting, our new-style Hobble Skirt has a shaped waistband and a full-length back zip with runners at either end, allowing for an adjustable back slit, to make walking that bit easier. Fully panelled and seamed to give a close, leg-hugging fit.
descriptions.short: Full length and thoroughly restricting, our new-style Hobble Skirt has a shaped waistband and a full-length back zip with runners at either end, allowing for an adjustable back slit.

descriptions.full: A long skirt, figure-hugging and flared below the knee - a classic latex look from Libidex. Available with a short back zip or without zip.
descriptions.short: A long skirt, figure-hugging and flared below the knee - a classic latex look from Libidex.

descriptions.full: This classy yet revealing full-length skirt allows you to show a bit of leg while still remaining elegant. It's fully panelled and seamed to give a close, hugging fit, and it's available with a short back zip.
descriptions.short: This classy yet revealing full-length skirt allows you to show a bit of leg while still remaining elegant.

descriptions.full: A new take on an old favourite, our 'Rita' Fishtail Skirt is a must for Hollywood Syren afficionados. Tailored to give silver screen appeal, we've given it an attractive shaped waistband (available in contrasting colour - please specify in comments section).
descriptions.short: A new take on an old favourite, our "Rita" Fishtail Skirt is a must for Hollywood Syren afficionados.

descriptions.full:
This skirt allows ample access to those naughty cheeks and allows you to parade your buttocks around in style. Beneath the opening are two faux holes with buckled straps. (seen here in Black and Chocolate with our Governess top in White and the Bastille Corset in Chocolate. Made in 0.50 mm This item has a side zip as standard.
Note: Buckles are subject to availability and may differ from those illustrated.
descriptions.short: This skirt allows ample access to those naughty cheeks and allows you to parade your buttocks around in style.

descriptions.full:
This tulip-shaped skirt is gathered at the knee with a 1940s style flounce, and comes with a tailored waist and is fastened with a short back zip. Also available with contrasting waistband (please specify in the comments section). Goes well with many of our Tops and Blouses.
For an interesting twist, see it as part of our Hospital Uniform!
descriptions.short: This tulip-shaped skirt is gathered at the knee with a 1940s style flounce, and comes with a tailored waist and is fastened with a short back zip.

descriptions.full: A skirt with a hard edge that gives you somewhere to hang your floggers and whips (if you ever stop using them!). Panelled and seamed, and with a shaped waistband to give a closely tailored fit, the Utility Skirt is finished with a series of silver D-rings.Shown here with our Coverness zipper Top.
descriptions.short: A skirt with a hard edge that gives you somewhere to hang your floggers and whips (if you ever stop using them.

descriptions.full: Derived from one of our firm favourites, the Monroe Dress, this flowing skirt with its highly unusual cut is both saucy and sophisticated. Diagonally cut to enhance your thigh, it's pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings. Seen here in Bubblegum Pink with our Can-Can Bra.
descriptions.short: Derived from one of our firm favourites, the Monroe Dress, this flowing skirt with its highly unusual cut is both saucy and sophisticated.

descriptions.full: A clever little skirt with four suspender clasps at the bottom of the skirt making it perfect for elaborating on - how about with a pair of our wonderful stockings? It fastens with a short back zip. Shown here in Black, Bronze, Vibrant Pink and Metallic Purple, with Classic Stockings and Classic Bra in Black.
descriptions.short: A clever little skirt with four suspender clasps at the bottom of the skirt making it perfect for elaborating on - how about with a pair of our wonderful stockings? It fastens with a short back zip.

descriptions.full: A simple and elegant version of our Aurora Peplum Skirt, this easy-to-wear Long Claudette Peplum skirt is pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings, and is finished with attractive edging in a contrasting colour. Available with any colour trim. These are great for transforming and outfit into something special, and goes well with our collection of Leotards, Knickers, Catsuits, Leggings - in fact nearly everything! Seen here worn over knickers (not included). For a shorter version, see our Short Claudette Peplum Skirt.  Seen here in Black with  Red trim with our Jezebel Bolero and Honey G-String.
descriptions.short: A simple and elegant version of our Aurora Peplum Skirt, this easy-to-wear Long Claudette Peplum skirt is pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings.

descriptions.full: A simple and elegant version of our Aurora Peplum Skirt, this easy-to-wear Short Claudette Peplum skirt is pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings, and is finished with attractive edging in a contrasting colour. Available with any colour trim. These are great for transforming and outfit into something special, and goes well with our collection of Leotards, Knickers, Catsuits, Leggings - in fact nearly everything! Seen here worn over knickers (not included). For a longer version, see our Long Claudette Peplum Skirt. Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink with our Lulu Stockings, Manette Bra and  Violetta Briefs.
descriptions.short: An elegant version of our Aurora Peplum Skirt, this easy-to-wear Short Claudette Peplum skirt is pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings, and is finished with contrasting attractive edging colour.

descriptions.full: The Marine Uniform Skirt includes a trimmed belt to match the trims faux pocket flaps. Made in 0.40mm latex. Only available in regular length. Seen here in Metallic Pewter (main colour) with Red (trim)
descriptions.short: The Marine Uniform Skirt includes a trimmed belt to match the trims faux pocket flaps.

descriptions.full: A take on the simple but striking style of the 1940s, this pencil wrap skirt is finished with a shaped, thicker waistband with 2 pairs of press studs each side for quick release! Also available with contrasting waistband and trim (shown here with our Classic Bra and as part of our Army Uniform).
descriptions.short: A take on the simple but striking style of the 1940s, this pencil wrap skirt is finished with a shaped, thicker waistband with 2 pairs of press studs each side for quick release.

descriptions.full:
A flattering circle skirt you can wear high waist. The Avril Skater Skirt is a classic basic item that can turn any outfit flirty in seconds. Simply pull on! Based on the much loved Lambada Skirt but a longer length. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black, Red and Translucent Pink.
Seen here with Goddess Top, Manette Bra and Cheshire Top.
descriptions.short: The Avril Skater Skirt is a classic basic item that can turn any outfit flirty in seconds.

descriptions.full: It's showtime! The Beetlejuice Skirt is an easy to wear skater skirt. The wide stripes are cleverly placed to create a unique look.Only available in regular length. (XXS-L 38-43cm, XL-6XL 44cm-49cm).Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with White (second colour), Black and Red, Back and Orange, and Black and Supatex Purple.
descriptions.short: It's showtime! The Beetlejuice Skirt is an easy to wear skater skirt.

descriptions.full: Less cheeky than our Rosetta and Cindy Frill Skirts, the Cheryl Frill Skirt still mixes innocence with naughtiness, featuring a wide waist-band with a nicely pleated skirt beneath. It's pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings. Finished in contrasting edge trim, also available without trim. Seen here in Black, and Black with White trim wit ou Maria Stockings, Adelphi Bra and Bisou Bra.
descriptions.short: Less cheeky than our Rosetta and Cindy Frill Skirts, the Cheryl Frill Skirt still mixes innocence with naughtiness, featuring a wide waist-band with a nicely pleated skirt beneath.

descriptions.full:
An addition to our popular stripey collection! The Cheshire Skirt includes wide parallel stripes throughout. Show of this skirt by teaming it with a basic top for a real stand out appearance.
Only available in Regular length. (XXS-L 38-43cm, XL-6XL 44cm-49cm)
Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Baby Pink (main colour) with Black (second colour), Metallic Grey with Bubblegum Pink, White with Royal Blue and Electric Lilac with Supatex Purple.
descriptions.short: An addition to our popular stripey collection! The Cheshire Skirt includes wide parallel stripes throughout.

descriptions.full: A playful, slip-on skirt - reminiscent of school days, cheerleading and the ice rink! The Chevron Skating Skirt features a V motif on the waistband and comes with trim in a contrasting colour. Very versatile and can turn other items such as Tops or Leotards into a full outfit. Seen in here in Black with Red trim with our Rosetta Bra, Rosetta Gauntlets and Alpha Leotard.
descriptions.short: A playful, slip-on skirt - reminiscent of school days, cheerleading and the ice rink.

descriptions.full: A retro-style pencil skirt with a flattering flounce at the back, the Dahlia is finished with a tailored waistband in thicker rubber (available in contrasting colour).The skirt is fully seamed to give the best shape and fit.
descriptions.short: A retro-style pencil skirt with a flattering flounce at the back, the Dahlia is finished with a tailored waistband in thicker rubber (available in contrasting colour).

descriptions.full: Finished with an eye-catching lace-up waistband, this high-waisted pencil-skirt goes well with many of our Tops and Shirts. The waistband can be made in a contrasting colour and the lace is available in a range of different colours too, offering a variety of different looks. And of course you can get your own lace to match your other outfits. Seen here with our Manette Bra (no trim).
descriptions.short: Finished with an eye-catching lace-up waistband, this high-waisted pencil-skirt goes well with many of our Tops and Shirts.

descriptions.full: A wrap skirt fastened with two press studs on the waistband, the Dorothy has a full skirt with plenty of flounce, cut slightly longer at the back, and is finished with a decorative bow and edge trim in a contrasting colour. Seen here in Black with White trim with our Valerie Bolero, and Cleo Boxy. Please note: nipple tussels are not included.
descriptions.short: A wrap skirt fastened with two press studs on the waistband, the Dorothy has a full skirt with plenty of flounce.

descriptions.full:
This a-line skirt has the perfect balance of flare that just kicks out from the hips. The hem is finished with contrasting double trims.
Only available in Regular Length. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Red (main colour) with White (trim), White with Black trim and White with Light Blue trim.
descriptions.short: This a-line skirt has the perfect balance of flare that just kicks out from the hips.

descriptions.full: A simple-pull-on mini-skirt, but with one very revealing feature - a 'flash' right across the front in translucent latex to give a peek at whatever lies beneath! Made in 0.50mm latex - pulls easily on and off, and is available with a zip as an option. Seen here in Black with Translucent Natural (second colour) with our Basic brief and Phillipa bra.
descriptions.short: A simple-pull-on mini-skirt, but with one very revealing feature - a 'flash' right across the front in translucent latex to give a peek at whatever lies beneath.

descriptions.full: With more than a glance over the shoulder to the 'flappers' of the 1920s, the Kitty Frou-Frou skirt is a tight-fitting creation finished with a ruffled hem gathered upwards at the back and fastened with a back zip. Shown here with our Peek-a-Boo top, but goes well with many other top styles.
descriptions.short: With more than a glance over the shoulder to the "flappers" of the 1920s, the Kitty Frou-Frou skirt has a tight-fitting finish with a ruffled hem gathered at the back and fastened with a back zip.

descriptions.full: From rollerskating to rock 'n' roll, this classic flared skirt design is at home anywhere, from the scorching latin dance floor, to the roller derby! Versatile and a veritable wardrobe essential! This pull-on skirt is simple but eye-catching. Approx Length 27-35cm depending on size.
descriptions.short: From rollerskating to rock "n' roll, this classic flared skirt design is at home anywhere, from the scorching latin dance floor, to the roller derby.

descriptions.full: It only takes a few press studs to open up this devious prim and proper skirt to reveal just that little bit more. Finished with a shaped waist and fastened with a line of press studs working their way up one thigh.
descriptions.short: It only takes a few press studs to open up this devious prim and proper skirt to reveal just that little bit more.

descriptions.full: A welcome addition to our military range, this skirt is a tight, figure-hugging number with back pocket flaps, and is available with or without zip - all present and correct!
descriptions.short: A welcome addition to our military range, this skirt is a tight, figure-hugging number with back pocket flaps, and is available with or without zip - all present and correct.

descriptions.full: Cut short and daring, our classic mini-skirt has a shaped waist band and is fully panelled and seamed to give a great fit. It fastens at the back with a short zip. Also available without zip. Now Available in our full size range XXS-6XL. Approximate lengths are measured from the top of the waistband to the bottom of the skirt through the centre front.
descriptions.short: Cut short and daring, our classic mini-skirt has a shaped waist band and is fully panelled and seamed to give a great fit.

descriptions.full: As tight as you like - a very simple, very short and very naughty pull-on skirt, made a bit special with an applique butterfly motif in a contrasting colour. Seen here in Black with Red trim with our Jezebel Bolero.
descriptions.short: As tight as you like - a very simple, very short and very naughty pull-on skirt, made a bit special with an applique  butterfly motif in a contrasting colour.

descriptions.full: A spanking-new pull-on skirt and very cheeky too, the Oo-La-La Skirt has a cut-out rear which stretches to allow good exposure. The rear opening is faced to give the best shape. Seen here with the Folie G-String (not included), Jezebel Bolero and Siren Bra.
descriptions.short: A spanking-new pull-on skirt and very cheeky too, the Oo-La-La Skirt has a cut-out rear which stretches to allow good exposure.

descriptions.full:
Simple but chic and attractive, this Pencil Skirt features a shaped waistband, a short back zip, and is fully panelled and seamed to ensure a tight, figure-hugging fit. Try it with Translucent colours to get the fully seamed effect, or with a custom contrasting waistband as shown (please specify in comments section). This will be a custom order which we don't offer size exchange, return or refund for.
Shown here with Classic G-String underneath. For something a bit shorter and more revealing, see our Mini Skirt.
descriptions.short: Simple but chic and attractive, this Pencil Skirt features a shaped waistband, a short back zip, and is fully panelled and seamed to ensure a tight, figure-hugging fit.

descriptions.full: A tight fitting skirt with an elegant back slit. Finished with a contrast colour trim and bow. Comes without zip.
descriptions.short: A tight fitting skirt with an elegant back slit.

descriptions.full: A mid thigh pencil skirt with a uniform style. The police skirt comes with a wide waistband, Eyelet Belt and include a number of D-rings. The front features 2 fake pockets trimmed with double lines. Only available in Regular. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Yellow (trim). And in Light Blue (main colour) with Metallic Black (trim). Also in Metallic Blue (main colour) with Black (trim).
descriptions.short: A mid thigh pencil skirt with a uniform style.

descriptions.full:
Short and daring but very girly, the Rosetta Skirt is cut very short with lots of nice pleats - innocent, but very saucy at the same time! It's pull-on, pull-off, without fastenings. Finished in contrasting edge trim with a bow. Seen in here with our Stockings, Folie G-String and Parisienne Bra.
The chart below refers to the skirt measurement and its stretch range. The Skirt is intended to sit lower down from the waist, so is slightly bigger than a normal waist skirt. If you are between sizes, we recommend sizing down.
descriptions.short: Short and daring but very girly, the Rosetta Skirt is cut very short with lots of nice pleats - innocent, but very saucy at the same time.

descriptions.full: The playful Sailor Skirt comes with a contrasting waistband and trims, and features a large laser cut anchor. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in White (main colour) with Royal Blue (trim), Baby Pink with Black, and in Light Blue with Black.
descriptions.short: The playful Sailor Skirt comes with a contrasting waistband and trims.

descriptions.full: From the front, this looks like an innocent little skirt, but turn it round and it's anything but! With four adjustable and removable straps framing the rear, and finished in contrasting edging. Seen here in Black with Red trim, it can be worn with our  Honey G- String as seen here (not included).
descriptions.short: From the front view this looks like an innocent little skirt, but turn it round and it's anything but.

descriptions.full: The little sister of our Satine Catsuit, this unusual skirt is finished with decorative lacing down the front (available in many different colours), and is seamed and panelled to give strength and shape. Available with a short zip at the back.
descriptions.short: The little sister of our Satine Catsuit, this unusual skirt is finished with decorative lacing down the front (available in many different colours).

descriptions.full: A playful, slip-on skirt - reminiscent of school days, cheerleading and the ice rink! The Shirley Skating Skirt features a shaped waistband finished with a bow and comes with trim in a contrasting colour. Very versatile and can turn other items such as Tops or Leotards into a full outfit. Seen here in Black with Red trim and Light Pink with Black trim.
descriptions.short: A playful, slip-on skirt - reminiscent of school days, cheerleading and the ice rink.

descriptions.full: A simple-pull-on mini-skirt, but with one very revealing feature - a 'swish' right across the front in translucent latex to give a peek at whatever lies beneath! Made in 0.50mm latex - pulls easily on and off, and is available with a zip as an option. Please note if you want the same see through effect seing in the photos please choose a Semi -Transparent  or Translucent colour.Seen here in Black with Translucent Natural (second colour).
descriptions.short: A simple-pull-on mini-skirt, but with one very revealing feature - a 'swish' right across the front in translucent latex to give a peek at whatever lies beneath.

descriptions.full: The playful Tidal Skirt features a crashing wave across the skirt. Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Electric Blue (main colour) with Metallic Petrol Blue (second colour) and White (trim)
descriptions.short: The playful Tidal Skirt features a crashing wave across the skirt.

descriptions.full: Something a bit different - our Long Aurora Peplum Skirt shows more than it should, with a revealingly risque high-cut at the front, and finished with a low shaped hem at the rear. The skirt is full and nicely ruffled. It's pull-on and needs no fastenings, and is finished with edge trim and a bow.  Also available without the bow. Please ask!  Seen here in Black with White Trim, Black with Metallic Fuchsia trim and Translucent Smoky Black with No trim with our Corona Briefs, Valerie Bolero, China Bolero and Stockings.
descriptions.short: Something a bit different - our Long Aurora Peplum Skirt shows more than it should, with a revealingly risque high-cut at the front, and finished with a low shaped hem at the rear.

descriptions.full: Something a bit different - our Short Aurora Peplum Skirt shows more than it should, with a revealingly risque high-cut at the front, and finished with a low shaped hem at the rear. The skirt is full and nicely ruffled. It's pull-on and needs no fastenings, and is finished with edge trim and a bow. Available with any colour trim. These are great for transforming and outfit into something special, and goes well with our collection of Leotards, Knickers, Catsuits, Leggings - in fact nearly everything! . For a longer version, see our Long Aurora Peplum Skirt.Seen here worn over Basic briefs (not included) and Valerie Bolero.
descriptions.short: Something a bit different - our Short Aurora Peplum Skirt shows more than it should, with a revealingly risque high-cut at the front, and finished with a low shaped hem at the rear.

descriptions.full: Revealingly cut, our Boulevard Peplum Skirt is open at the front and secured with a buckle belt around the waist - making it the perfect partner for our Boulevard Cape! It's great for transforming and outfit into something special, and goes well with our collection of Leotards, Knickers, Catsuits, Leggings - in fact nearly everything! Seen here worn over our Basic Briefs (not included), Lulu Stockings and Copine Bra.
descriptions.short: Revealingly cut, our Boulevard Peplum Skirt is open at the front and secured with a buckle belt around the waist - making it the perfect partner for our Boulevard Cape.

descriptions.full:
A variation on our Princess style, the Diamond Leotard is complemented by its trimmed keyhole feature. Attractively cut and tailored, it shows off the figure to good effect. PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.
descriptions.short: A variation on our Princess style, the Diamond Leotard is complemented by its trimmed keyhole feature.

descriptions.full:
Our Double Bubble Leotard features shoulder and thigh detail with double-keyhole openings at the front, which is a great way to keep you cool inside and looking sizzling hot on the outside.Only back-zip available with this style.
PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.
descriptions.short: Our Double Bubble Leotard features shoulder and thigh detail with double-keyhole openings at the front, which is a great way to keep you cool inside and looking sizzling hot on the outside.

descriptions.full:
Our Goddess Leotard is one of our most sensuous creations and can certainly make you feel divine! Featuring a high collar and a seductive chest cut-out design, the outfit can be finished with a contrasting trim of your choice.
PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.
descriptions.short: Our Goddess Leotard is one of our most sensuous creations and can certainly make you feel divine.

descriptions.full: Make them drop dead with this Killer Leotard. Strongly designed with front neck and shoulder buckle details and decorative keyhole openings on the shoulders and front, this outfit will make an impact anywhere. This style comes with back zip only. Seen here in Black with Red trim, and in Metallic Grey with Black trim. Styled with our Military Hat, Eyelet Belt, Chain Purse and Hostess Cap.
descriptions.short: Make them drop dead with this Killer Leotard! Strongly designed with front neck and shoulder buckle details and decorative keyhole openings on the shoulders and front.

descriptions.full:
A classic cut leotard derived from our best selling Matrix Catsuit, featuring the famous panelled construction. Simple but effective. Also available in a Low Cut version cut more fully over the leg.
PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.
descriptions.short: A classic cut leotard derived from our best selling Matrix Catsuit, featuring the famous panelled construction.

descriptions.full:
A classic cut leotard derived from our best selling Matrix Catsuit, featuring the famous panelled construction. Simple but effective. Also available in a High Cut version cut less fully over the leg.
PLEASE NOTE: Back Zip = through-crotch back zip with 3 sliders, Half Back Zip = 3/4 length back zip with 1 slider.
If you are ordering a catsuit with attached gloves, they are only available in the following colours: Black, Red, Met Blue, White and Semi Trans Natural.

As our regular customers know, nothing beats the sheer fit of a Libidex stocking. These Cabaret Stockings features a wide contrasting top band to match the back seam trim and tailored foot. The back of the stockings is finished off with a curved diamond to capture a classic hoisery look. Made in 0.25mm latex. Seen here in Black with Baby Pink trim.
Regular Foot = UK 3-7/ EU 36-41     Long Foot = UK 8-11/ EU 42-46
 PLEASE NOTE: These measurements refer to your body measurements. Length is measured from ankle bone to top thigh.
descriptions.short: As our regular customers know, nothing beats the sheer fit of a LIBIDEX stocking.

descriptions.full:
Our Classic Stockings with a suggestive 'cherry' motif that makes them just that little bit unusual. The stockings incorporate the famous tailored Libidex foot. The cherry motif is only available in Red.
Regular Foot = UK 3-7/ EU 36-41     Long Foot = UK 8-11/ EU 42-46
PLEASE NOTE: These measurements refer to your body measurements. Length is measured from ankle bone to top thigh.

Available in three lengths, and three foot lengths!
PLEASE NOTE: These measurements refer to your body measurements. Length is measured from ankle bone to top thigh.

Made from 0.25mm lighter latex, they introduce the new-style Libidex tailored foot. They go well with our matching Frisson Suspender Belt. Seen here in Translucent Natural with Black trim, Black with Red trim, and Black with White trim. Seen in here with our Dita Bra, Marlene Jacket, Harlem Jacket, Cami Briefs,Frisson Suspender Belt, Georgina G-String&

They're thoroughly maritime throughout, with appliqued anchor motif and trim in contrasting colour, (sailor hat not included). descriptions.full:
Our well-established pattern with foot panels is ideally suited to this new style, which we have created to capture the hot hosiery look of days gone by. These stockings have band at the top in contrasting colour which forms the back seam down the back of the leg to the foot. Works well in combination with our suspenders, knickers and g-strings. Rubber thickness is 0.25mm, which is our standard stocking thickness. Top of stocking is backed with thicker, 0.50mm rubber reinforcement so that stockings can be worn with or without a suspender belt.Shown here in Translucent Pink with Black trim, Black with Red trim and Semi-Trans. Cloud Grey with Yellow trim.

Now available in a thicker version of0.40mm. This will have a stiff and much thicker fit. May cause some discomfort, for the hardcore rubberist!

The stockings come in thin 0.25mm rubber as standard. 
Available in three lengths, and three foot lengths! And now available in a thicker version of 0.40mm. This will have a stiff and much thicker fit. May cause some discomfort, for the hardcore rubberist!

descriptions.full: A halterneck bra with a wide under-cup band and edge trim in thicker rubber in contrasting colour, the Adelphi Bra is chic and stylish. Evoking a French retro style, the Biarritz Bra features a classic matrix pattern on the upper breast cup with three contrasting colours. Shown here in Black (main colour) Trans.Black (second colour) with Black (trim 1) and White (trim 2). The bra comes with adjustable straps and is fastened with three double popper studs at the back. Also available as a set with matching Biarritz Knickers.
ALL MEASUREMENTS ARE IN CENTIMETRES.

Seen here in Red with Translucent Natural (second colour) and in Black with Translucent Smoky Black (second colour).
The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: Cut a dash on the red carpet with this thoroughly risque evening gown.

descriptions.full:
This glamorous gown hugs your figure and flaunts your bust. The dress even features a fake bolero to complete the Hollywood look. This dress has a short back zip. Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink trim.The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
  (inches)                                       OVER BUST ->
descriptions.short: This glamorous gown hugs your figure and flaunts your bust.

descriptions.full: Another stunning floor length gown to show off your best assets! This Oriental style dress concentrates solely on showing off your favourite pair of nipple pasties or bravely go without! The fishtail hem lets you move around freely. Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink trim. (Pasties not included)The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: Another stunning floor length gown to show off your best assets!

descriptions.full: A contemporary take on a Grecian inspired design. This dress features a striking neck detail with buttons at the back, connecting to a shapely sweetheart neckline at the front. Turn around to reveal a long back split to tease the spectators. Click here to see our shorter version.The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: A contemporary take on a Grecian inspired design.

descriptions.full: Devastatingly seductive and totally kinky, the Lucretia Gown opens right down the front to reveal (nearly) all, and is fastened by a wide waist band with press studs. The loose sleeves are gathered by buttoned wrist bands, and the whole is made from lighter more sensual, 0.25mm latex which flows and rustles delightfully over the body. Especially alluring in translucent latex!Seen here in Black with Metallic Honey trim, and in Translucent Pink with no trim with our Basic Briefs.
descriptions.short: Devastatingly seductive and totally kinky, the Lucretia Gown opens right down the front to reveal (nearly) all, and is fastened by a wide waist band with press studs.

descriptions.full: In traditional Japanese style, evoking all the sensuality of the orient, this exotic and loose-fitting night gown is made of thinner 0.25mm latex, allowing the garment to flow around the body. It's trimmed with contrasting colour latex with a Japanese fan motif, has wide sleeve openings, and is fastened at the waist with a tie-up belt. Seen here in Black with Baby Pink trim.
descriptions.short: In traditional Japanese style, evoking all the sensuality of the orient, this exotic and loose-fitting night gown is made of thinner 0.25mm.

descriptions.full: Devastatingly seductive and totally kinky, the Lucretia Dress opens right down the front to reveal (nearly) all, and is fastened by a wide waist band with five buttons. The loose sleeves are gathered by buttoned wrist bands, and the whole is made from lighter, 0.25mm latex which flows and rustles delightfully over the body. Especially alluring in translucent latex! Seen here in Black with Met honey trim.
descriptions.short: Devastatingly seductive and totally kinky, the Lucretia Dress opens right down the front to reveal (nearly) all, and is fastened by a wide waist band with five buttons.

descriptions.full: Designed to show off what matters, the Crysal Halter Gown is a daring creation with a risque yet elegant cleavage, and showing just the right amount of leg. The front is finished with decorative lacing intricately crossed across the front of the dress through miniature silver d-rings. The dress can also be made with contrasting trim around the opening.
descriptions.short: Designed to show off what matters, the Crysal Halter Gown is a daring creation with a risque yet elegant cleavage, and showing just the right amount of leg.

descriptions.full:
Be the Belle of the Ball with this wonderfully decadent Gemma Gown, full-length and complete with an extravagant train. Finished with a rouched bust and an adjustable halterneck strap. Available with or without a back zip.
The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: Be the Belle of the Ball with this wonderfully decadent Gemma Gown

descriptions.full: This classic Bardot style dress brings Parisian glamour into your latex wardrobe! The faux belt gives a delicate detail to this full length fishtail dress. This dress is available with a half back zip. Seen here in Metallic Blue and Metallic Platinum trim.The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: This classic Bardot style dress brings Parisian glamour into your latex wardrobe!

descriptions.full:
This seductive gown features an alluring thigh high leg split and a timeless sweetheart neckline. The shoulder straps are adjustable and the dress is available with or without zip. Also available with a contrasting trim around the neckline - please ask!
The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: This seductive gown features an alluring thigh high leg split and a timeless sweetheart neckline.

descriptions.full:
A real stunner at more formal occasions, the Tequila Evening Gown features our Tequila-style low neckline and underwired cups with a surprisingly revealing long split skirt. Fastens with a short rear zip.
ALL MEASUREMENTS ARE IN CENTIMETRES.
descriptions.short: A real stunner at more formal occasions, the Tequila Evening Gown features our Tequila-style low neckline and underwired cups with a revealing long split skirt.

descriptions.full: A seductive floor length gown, this dress has an enticing low cut neckline and a thigh high front split to really show off your legs! Pick translucent colours for the panels to really make this dress captivating. It is available with a short back zip. Seen here in Metallic Purple and Translucent Lilac.The lengths are measured from front neck to hem.
descriptions.short: A seductive floor length gown, this dress has an enticing low cut neckline and a thigh high front split to really show off your legs!

descriptions.full: In traditional Thai style, evoking all the sensuality of the orient, this exotic and loose-fitting night gown is made of thinner 0.25mm latex, allowing the garment to flow around the body. It's trimmed with a wide neck-line reaching right to the base of the garment, and has bell-shaped sleeve openings finished with a wide trim. It's fastened at the waist with a tie-up belt.Seen here in Black with Baby Pink (second colour).

descriptions.short: The Cecile G String is a version of our classic G String design, but cut a little bit lower on the waist - a fine addition to your lingerie wardrobe.

Our classic Libidex G-String with a shaped rear panel, side seams and a flat seemless front.This item is available in our full range of colours, just select from the menu below for choices. Shown here in black, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the menu. Worn with our Juliana Bra, Siren Bra and Stockings.
Now available in different thicknesses!

Similar to our Love boxy and  Love Briefs but cut as a G-String, again with side seams and heart design on front in contrast colour. Goes well with our Love Bra and Love Stockings.
Shown here in Black with Red.
descriptions.short: Similar to our Love boxy and Love Briefs but cut as a G-String, again with side seams and heart design on front in contrast colour.

This item is available in our full range of colours, just select from the menu below for choices. Rubber thickness is 0.40mm which is our standard.Shown here in black with metallic pewter trim, but different colours are also available, just select your choice from the menu below.

descriptions.full: With an simple and effective trimmed design (shown here in Metallic Blue, with Electric Blue trim) this belt combines class and charm, and even has a cheeky reference in the clasp - borrowed straight from an airline seatbelt!

A substantial, wide hipster belt finished with piping and large chunky front buckle. Goes well with many of our catsuits.
Please note the belt is designed to sit on the hip bone, so the measurements are slightly bigger than a wasit belt.
descriptions.short: A substantial, wide hipster belt finished with piping and large chunky front buckle.

descriptions.full:
A substantial, wide hipster belt finished with a large chunky front buckle. Goes well with many of our catsuits.
Measure around you hip bone for the correct fit
descriptions.short: A substantial, wide hipster belt finished with a large chunky front buckle.

The Eyelet Belt is made from thick rubber and has a silver coloured buckles and metal holes. Looks great with and really makes a difference to our range of Catsuits, Jeans and Leggings. Comes in various sizes to suit you, and in the full spectrum of Radical Rubber colours.
All measurements are to fit actual body measurements. Please be aware, these are waist sizes, if you want your belt around your lower waist for low cut jeans, you will need it to pick a bigger belt size to match this.
descriptions.short: The essential eyelet belt for female measurements. Please double check the size chart below. For bigger sizes, see male version.

descriptions.full:
This minimal waist belt adds effortless style to your outfit. The Opal Belt is fastened at the back with press studs and features a simple O-ring design on the front. Sized to fit the waist measurement. Made in 1.6mm latex, therefore only available in Radical Rubber colours. Seen here in Black.
Actual Belt measurements, with little stretch.
descriptions.short: The Opal Belt is fastened at the back with press studs and features a simple O-ring design on the front

descriptions.full: A simple edition to add on top of any outfit. The sailor belt has an elegant slide in clasp that locks into place. Finished off with a double trim in a contrasting colour. Made in 0.80mm latex. Seen here in Royal Blue (main) with White (trim). And in Royal Blue (main) with Pearlsheen Gold (trim). Also in White (main) with Royal Blue (trim). And in Black (main) with Pearlsheen Silver (trim).
descriptions.short: The sailor belt has an elegant slide in clasp that locks into place.

descriptions.full: The Trixie Belt  is a wide waistbelt adorned in all the embellishment! The belt features spikes, chains and O-rings to add style to any plain outfit. Made in 1.6mm latex, therefore only available in Radical Rubber colours. Seen here in Black. sizing based on waist measurement.
descriptions.short: The Trixie Belt  is a wide waistbelt adorned in all the embellishment!

descriptions.full: Introducing the scandalous Cowgirl Chaps! These female chaps are a hipster style pair of trousers with an open crotch and bum. The legs include a full length zip for authenticity and contrasting panels for a dash of colour. They are fastened at the front with a buckle and can also be adjusted with the lacing at the back. Made in 0.50mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Plum (second colour) and Pearlsheen Silver (trim). And in Metallic Pewter (main colour) with White (second colour) and Black (trim). Choose your inside leg measurement for the perfect fit - measured from crotch to hem - (don't forget to take heels into consideration).

 PLEASE NOTE: These measurements refer to your body measurements.

Made from lighter 0.25mm latex to ensure they pull on and off easily, they are fashioned on the design for the tailored Libidex foot. Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink trim, and in Black with Baby Pink trim.

descriptions.full:
A subtle take on traditional Chinese dress, the China Bolero is fastened at the neck with five press studs, and has arm openings and neck line trimmed in a contrasting colour. Shown here in Metallic Fuchsia with Black trim and Black with Red trim. Worn with our, Tequila Sunrise Dress, Corona Bra, Aurora Peplum Skirt and Mariana Trousers.
Please note: nipple tassels not included.

The collar is buttoned with silver press studs and include a belt, cleverly buckled to the bolero to stay in place. This can be removed too! Made in 0.40mm latex. Seen here in Black (main colour) with Red (trim).

Shown here with edges trimmed in red, it's also available without trim seen in here with our Mirabelle Micro Skirt, Chevron Skating Skirt and Claudette Peplum Skirt, (nipple tassels are not included).

descriptions.full: The female version of a male classic - Libidex has created a jockstrap for girls which covers up only what it needs to! Seen here with our Stockings and Siren Bra.
descriptions.short: The female version of a male classic - Libidex has created a jockstrap for girls which covers up only what it needs to.

descriptions.full: The Libidex version of the male classic jock strap, this cheeky design goes as bare as it dares! Seen here with our Siren Bra.
descriptions.short: The Libidex version of the male classic jock strap, this cheeky design goes as bare as it dares.

descriptions.full: Buckle up these shoe stirrups to add more latex to your footwear! These shoe stirrups fit over most high heels shoes and stop at the ankle for a quick and efficient look seen here with our Sleeveless Leotard. Available in One Size only and ankle straps are adjustable. Made in 1.6 mm latex. Seen here in Black, and in Red.
descriptions.short: Buckle up these shoe stirrups to add more latex to your footwear!

descriptions.full: An unusual take on a classic design, the Amazon Swimsuit is a real head-turner with its off-the-shoulder look. Figure-hugging and flattering it shows off the body line to best avantage. No zip - step-in, step-out! Goes well with our Lambada Skirt and Skating Skirt PLEASE NOTE: we don't recommend that you actually swim in this! Seen here in Black, Metallic Purple with Black trim, Metallic Green with Black trim, and Metallic Blue with Black trim with our  Boulevard Peplum Skirt.
descriptions.short: An unusual take on a classic design, the Amazon Swimsuit is a real head-turner with its off-the-shoulder look.

descriptions.full:
A classicly styled swimsuit - the sort that made St Tropez famous! Figure-hugging and flattering, cool to wear, and nicely finished with contrasting trim edging. No zip - step-in, step-out! Goes well with our Lambada Skirt and Skating Skirt. Shown here in Black with Red trim, Black with Black trim, Black with Bubblegum Pink and Black with Jade Green trim.  Seen in here with our Claudette Peplum Skirt and Boulevard Peplum Skirt.
PLEASE NOTE: we don't recommend that you actually swim in this!
descriptions.short: A classicly styled swimsuit - the sort that made St Tropez famous, figure-hugging and flattering, cool to wear, and nicely finished with contrasting trim edging.

descriptions.full: A sportily-cut full-body swimsuit with a Y-shaped back, this is a very flattering number, showing off the body line to best advantage, and is nicely finished with contrasting trim edging. No zip - step-in, step-out! Goes well with our Lambada Skirt and Skating Skirt PLEASE NOTE: we don't recommend that you actually swim in this! Seen here in Black with White trim and Metallic Red with White trim.
descriptions.short: A sportily-cut full-body swimsuit with a Y-shaped back, this is a very flattering number, showing off the body line to best advantage, and is nicely finished with contrasting trim edging.

descriptions.full: Drawing on traditional French lingerie designs, the delightfully naughty Marie Nightie is finished with crinkle-cut lines under the bra cups and following right down the back of the garment, which is fastened with a short zip. Made in lighter 0.25mm latex to flow over the body with a delightful rustling sound - and especially seductive in translucent colours! Available with or without a short back zip.Seen here in Black with Bubblegum Pink trim, and in Translucent Pink with Electric Rose trim.
descriptions.short: Drawing on traditional French lingerie designs, the delightfully naughty Marie Nightie is finished with crinkle-cut lines under the bra cups and following right down the back of the garment.

descriptions.full: Drawing on traditional French lingerie designs, the delightfully naughty Marietta Nightie exposes the left thigh with a daringly split leg. It's finished with bows to the front, and crinkle-cut lines down the front of the garment, which is fastened with a short zip (also available without the zip). Made in lighter 0.25mm latex to flow over the body with a delightful rustling sound - and especially seductive in translucent colours! Seen here in Black with White trim, and in Translucent Lilac with Metallic Purple trim.
descriptions.short: Drawing on traditional French lingerie designs, the delightfully naughty Marietta Nightie exposes the left thigh with a daringly split leg.

descriptions.full:
A Waspie in the traditional Victorian style, formed of ten latex panels, fastened with busks at the front and lacing at the back. Featured here on our Two-Piece Catsuit.
Approx. Centre Front Length XS-M 24-26cm // L-XXL 27-29cm
The following size chart refers to your own body measurements. To achieve a classic corset waist, the corset will have a 4 inch difference from your waist measurement.
descriptions.short: A Waspie in the traditional Victorian style, formed of ten latex panels, fastened with busks at the front and lacing at the back.

descriptions.full:
For a stunning and very retro look, choose our Fantasia Corselette featuring an applique trim with a fan motif. The bra cups are under-wired and the garment comes complete with adjustable shoulder straps and four suspender ends. It fastens at the back with a full-length zip. Let your fantasies rip! Seen here in Black (primary colour) and White (trim colour) with Black lace. Seen here with our Stockings and G- String ( not included).
Please note, due to difference in latex thickness, there might be variation in colour as the thicker latex needed for the bras can be darker than the thinner ones used for the briefs and stockings.
If you want the same colour as the website please choose the following colour configuration:
Colour Primary: Black  -  Secondary White  -  Colour Lace : Black
  
(inches)                                       OVER BUST ->
descriptions.short: For a stunning and very retro look, choose our Fantasia Corselette featuring an applique trim with a fan motif.

descriptions.full:
A beautifully shaped bustier offering full support and enhancing the cleavage, the Belladonna has a nicely shaped bottom edge scooping down towards the navel, and has fully under-wired bra cups finished in a contrasting trim. It's fastened at the back with a full-length zip. Seen in here with our Stockings and Basic Boxy.
 ALL MEASUREMENTS ARE IN CENTIMETRES.
descriptions.short: A beautifully shaped bustier offering full support and enhancing the cleavage, the Belladonna has a nicely shaped bottom edge scooping down towards the navel.

descriptions.full: This cute little crop top features a wide neck opening and is cut to fit. Looks good with Jeans and Leggings. Available with or without zip. Also can be made with a contrasting trim around the neck and sleeves.
descriptions.short: This cute little crop top features a wide neck opening and is cut to fit.

descriptions.full: The classic crossover between Jeans and Leggings, the Janice Jeggings sport all the features of a traditional pair of jeans, with two working front pockets, belt loops and a strong front zip. Made from strong 0,50mm latex. Shown here with our Eyelet Belt (not included).
descriptions.short: The classic crossover between Jeans and Leggings, the Janice Jeggings sport all the features of a traditional pair of jeans.

descriptions.full:
Need we say more? The classic hotpants - a best seller and with good reason! Also available with garment options,please see the chart on the right. Shown with the Lindsey Crop Top.
When ordering the crotch hole option please state whether you would like the Female or Male version.
descriptions.short: Need we say more? The classic hotpants - a best seller and with good reason.

descriptions.full: Big Eye Hood with double ponytail with eyes and mouth trim. This is one of our most stylish and s theatrical hoods, for that special occasion when you want to have everyone gasping for air at your mere sight!S/M = Forehead 53cm - 56cmM/L = Forehead 56cm - 59cmL/XL = Forehead 59cm - 62cm
descriptions.short: The hood boasts a double ponytail with eyes and mouth trim, this is one of our most stylish and s theatrical hoods.

descriptions.short: Open Face Hood without chin and with Double Streamers.

descriptions.full: Our classic timeless Open Face hood with Chin and Single Streamer. It can be made in two colours. Comes with back zipper
